loans.use: to purchase additional prepaid airtime credit for helping community members who need access to communication services.

loans.name: Irpan

texts.en:
Good day, lenders! This is Irpan, one of Ruma's agents. Irpan is a young guy who lives in West Bogor, a suburban area located about a two-hour drive from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. He owns a stall that sells mobile airtime credits for his community. He joined Ruma last year and he decided to join Ruma because he has an interest in Ruma's service and system. Even though he is still young, Irpan already has many customers. His community sees him as a friendly and informative mobile provider.

As the business grows, Irpan needs additional capital and is seeking a working capital loan from Kiva. He will use the capital to provide more mobile airtime credit to his community, so his community can easily connect with their loved ones, no matter how far they are apart. Irpan’s goal towards Ruma in the near future is to serve as an e-commerce business for his community, with Ruma’s latest product called Mapan. Irpan is the one who is seen in the photo. He is thankful for your kind support.

loans.use: to purchase additional prepaid airtime credit for helping community members who need access to communication services.

loans.name: Srey Nang

texts.en:
Srey Nang, 23, lives in a community of Pursat Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of two children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small rice farmland which is located near her house. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 2.50 a day.

She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration.

She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Paulino

texts.en: Paulino signed up his membership in 2014. He accessed a loan for his farming activities. For this cropping season, he applied for another loan to pay for leveling and cleaning dikes. He wants to make sure that everything is ready for his farming activities. Paulino hopes to have a good harvest so that he can purchase another piece of land to cultivate.

loans.use: to pay for leveling and cleaning dikes.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en: Erlinda is from Dapitan City. She is married to a fisherman and they have four children. Erlinda has a fish vending business and earns approximately 5,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase fishing nets and pay for more stock of fish from her neighbors to resell. Erlinda has been a member of PMPC for three years.

loans.use: to purchase fishing nets and pay for more stock of fish from her neighbors to resell.

loans.name: Simplicia

texts.en: Simplicia makes a good earning on her farm in Mahayag. This is the primary means of their income, supporting their needs. She wants to increase her farm yield, Simplicia approached Paglaum to loan an amount to purchase fertilizer, herbicides and compost. She has high hopes that she will have good produce next cropping season.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer, herbicides and compost.

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 45 years old and a very hard working entrepreneur. She operates an accessories business in the Philippines, which she has been doing for three years.

Alma requested a loan from NWTF for 15,000 PHP, which she will use to buy additional items such as earrings, rings, necklaces, etc. to sell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional items such as earrings, rings, necklaces, etc.

loans.name: Rika

texts.en:
Hello lenders! This is Rika, one of Ruma’s agents. Rika lives in South Bogor, a suburban area located in West Java, around two hours from Jakarta, the capital city of Indonesia. Rika is happily married and she and her husband have two cute children. As a main source of income, Rika owns and manages a small stall that sell daily consumer products. She just joined Ruma last year. She feels excited to learn more about mobile technology from Ruma’s mobile application.

Right now, Rika is becoming an agent for Ruma's e-commerce service designed for lower income communities called Mapan. By supporting this loan you will be providing extra working capital for Rika's shop. Mapan enables customers to save up, little by little, by depositing change at agents like Rika and as their balance grows, it allows customers to make major asset purchases like housewares, appliances, and school supplies for their children.

As a Mapan agent, Rika is responsible for processing deposits from customers into their Mapan accounts as well as receiving orders from customers who want to buy products listed in Ruma's Mapan catalog. When a customer orders, Rika will submit the order via SMS and, within 5-10 days, the product will be delivered to the customer. With Mapan, Rika believes that her community will be able to have access to higher quality products with better prices.

Rika is the one who is seen in the photo. She is thankful for your kind and endless support for her community.

loans.use: to provide additional working capital for her shop, thereby facilitating introduction of Ruma's new saving plan for low income communities.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José de 45 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus cuatro hijos, el se dedica al cultivo de güisquil desde hace 10 años  inicio su trabajo con capital propio, comercializa sus productos en los mercados que están cerca de su casa y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono, fertilizantes y controles de plagas para poder tener un buen cultivo y así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José, age 45, lives in his own home along with his life companion and their four children. He has been cultivating chayote squash for 10 years. José started in this line of work with his own capital. He sells his products at the markets near his home. With the income he earns from his sales, José is able to cover some of his household expenses.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy compost, fertilizer, and pest controls so that he can have a good crop and provide a better quality of life for his family.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizer, and pest controls.

loans.name: El Diamante Group

texts.es:
El grupo “El Diamante”, 4 mujeres trabajadoras conforman este grupo, siendo solidarias, responsables esta por séptima vez solicitando crédito para poder invertirlos en sus negocios y realizar mejoras con las ganancias obtenidas. 
Mercedes, es la coordinadora del grupo, 24 años, casada y con 3 hijos de 1, 4  y 6 años de edad. Se dedica a la venta de pan, y lo comercializa en mercados municipales y capitalinos del país. Este negocio lo inicio desde hace 7 años con la ayuda de su esposo. El crédito lo invertirá en la compra de harina, levadura, leña, sal. Todas estas materias principales de consumo en la producción. Con las ganancias obtenidas tiene en claro la ampliación del negocio. 
Las demás integrantes, Claudina de 55 años, se dedica a la preparación y venta de frijoles y tortillas en su casa y tiene su clientela fija, la inversión la hará para compra de maíz, leña y frijoles. Dalila, de 39 años,  se dedica a la venta de pan. Maria Exequiela, de 36 años, se dedica al negocio de la venta de pan.
texts.en:
The "El Diamante" group is made up of four hardworking women who are supportive and responsible.  They are requesting a loan for the seventh time to invest in their businesses and make improvements with the earnings they make.  

Mercedes, who is the coordinator of the group, is 24, married, and has three children who are 1, 4, and 6 years old.  She sells bread for a living and she sells in the country's municipal markets and its capital city markets.  She started this business seven years ago with her husband's help.  She will invest this loan in flour, yeast, firewood, and salt.  These are all the main materials she uses in her production.  With the earnings she makes she plans to expand her business.  

The other members, Claudina, who is 55, makes and sells beans and tortillas in her house and has a steady clientele; she will invest in corn, firewood, and beans.  Dalila, who is 39, sells bread for a living.  Maria Exequiela, who is 36, sells also bread.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, firewood, and salt.

loans.name: Genevie

texts.en: Genevie has more than a decade of running her business. She finds pleasure in doing farming activities. At the age of 43 with four children to sustain, she is doubling her efforts to take care of her rice farming activities. She owes MPC for all her capital needs. Recently, she availed herself of another loan to pay for land preparation and purchase fertilizers for this cropping season. In the future, Genevie hopes to open a display outlet for their produce.

loans.use: to pay for land preparation and purchase fertilizers for this cropping season

loans.name: Jose Orlando

texts.es:
Jairo, de 24 años de edad, estudia actualmente en la universidad la carrera de sociología, está soltero, vive con sus padres y su hermana. 

Jairo, se dedica a hacer trabajos eléctricos, como instalaciones y reparaciones, aprendió esta labor en capacitaciones y cursos, el trabaja para muchas personas como vecinos, amigos y recomendados, trabaja todos los días por las tardes, ya que en las mañanas se dedica a estudiar.

Jairo, necesita el crédito para comprar más herramientas, para ejercer mejor su trabajo necesita herramientas especializadas, que actualmente no posee.

El principal sueño de Jairo, es tener una empresa de instalaciones eléctricas en residenciales y formar su familia.
texts.en:
Jairo is 24 years old and is currently studying sociology at university. He is single and lives with his parents and his sister.

Jairo makes a living doing electric work, such as installations and repairs. He learned this work through trainings and courses. He works for many people such as neighbors, friends, and references. He works everyday in the afternoon so that he can dedicate his mornings to studying.

Jairo needs this loan to buy more tools, to improve his work he needs specialized tools that he currently doesn't have.

Jairo's main dream is to have a home electric installation business and to start a family.

loans.use: to buy more tools

loans.name: Badenya-Ton Group

texts.fr:
YAYA est le Monsieur qui a ses mains sur le sac d’arachide sur la photo. 
YAYA est  un malien, âgé de 59 ans non scolarisé, marié et père de 7 enfants, âgés de 14 à 30 ans tous non scolarisés. Sa femme est une ménagère.
YAYA fait le commerce de céréales, arachides, piment. Il fait recourt au RMCR pour avoir plus d’argent et s’achète beaucoup de sacs de céréales  afin de gagner  plus de profit.   Il s’approvisionne dans les foires de sa  localité et revend dans les mêmes foires. Il  a une expérience de 20 ans  d’activité.
Dans ses ventes, il gagne en moyenne  15000 FCFA de profit par mois.Avec le profit,  YAYA  pourra subvenir aux besoins de sa famille (habillement, santé et frais de condiment),  Il est souvent confronte à des situations de mévente. 
Dans l’avenir YAYA  veut  un prêt  plus élevé afin de s’acheté des bœufs de laboure pour mieux exploiter son champ  avec sa  famille.
texts.en:
Yaya is the person holding a bag of peanuts in the photo. Yaya is from Mali and 59 years old. He did not attend school. He is married and the father of seven children ranging from 14 to 30 years old. None have attended school. His wife is a homemaker.

Yaya sells cereals, peanuts and pimento peppers. He has applied for a loan to RMCR in order to have a larger capital and stock up on bags of cereals in order to earn a higher profit. He stocks up at the regularly held local markets, where he also resells. He has 20 years of experience in this business.

Through his  sales he makes an average monthly profit of 15,000 CFA francs. In this way, Yaya provides for his family’s needs (clothing, healthcare and food expenses). He often has to deal with a low sales volume. In the future, Yaya would like to obtain a larger loan  to buy oxen and be able to to better work his field with his family.

loans.use: to buy bags of cereals for resale.

loans.name: Sreymao

texts.en:
Sreymao, 50, lives in a community of Takeo Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of five children. To make a living and support her family, she manages and operates a farming business on a small plot of rice farmland, which is located near her house. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 2.00 a day.

She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine.

By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena is 45 years old and married with two children. With one child currently in school, Rowena works very hard to provide for them.

Rowena runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell such as canned goods, snack foods, candies, biscuits, coffee, detergent soap, etc.

Rowena has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as canned goods, snack foods, candies, biscuits, coffee, detergent soap, etc.

Rowena would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as canned goods, snack foods, candies, biscuits, coffee, detergent soap, etc.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose is a United States Armed Forces Veteran who served our country for 24 years, and is also a devoted husband, father and grandfather to his family. Jose and his family have experienced a lot of setbacks recently that have affected Jose and his wife’s credit greatly. After the housing market plummeted, Jose and his wife struggled to pay their living expenses and the mortgage on the home that they love.  Jose’s wife of 40 years suffered a serious medical issue that has left her disabled and totally dependent on Jose’s care. He struggles to make ends meet, but he does the best he can for his family. Jose recently assumed primary custody of his two grandsons, and although this makes Jose’s financial difficulties even harder, he is happy to ensure that they are well taken care of. Jose has since refinanced his home and has made great progress with repairing his credit and getting back on track, but he still needs a bit of help. The family’s air conditioner has stopped working and they are in desperate need of a new unit. With four family members and temperatures soaring, the home has become very uncomfortable to live in during the day, and Jose’s wife cannot afford to deal with the heat considering her current health. Jose is hoping that SELF and Kiva can help finance a new high-efficiency air conditioner that will improve the quality of life for his family as well as save money on their electric bills.

Jose will use his Kiva loan to pay for a new high-efficiency air conditioner to improve his family’s quality of life and save money on the family’s electric bills.

loans.use: to purchase a new high-efficiency air conditioner to improve his family’s quality of life and save money on the family’s electric bills.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es:
Tomas tiene 62 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Pomahuaca, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, se encuentra ubicado en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica al comercio, cuenta con una bodega ubicada en su propio domicilio, tiene más de 06 años de experiencia en este negocio y cuenta con buenas referencias por parte de los pobladores de su distrito. El préstamo lo utilizará para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto el espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Tomas is 62 years old and lives with his wife and children in a rural area in the District of Pomahuaca. The people engage in agriculture, trade, and livestock breeding. This community is located in Jaén Province, which is part of the region of Cajamarca in the northern mountains of Peru.

Tomas engages in trade and has a store located in his own home. He has more than six years of experience in this business and has received good references from some of the residents in his district. His loan will be used to buy a large quantity of products so that he can increase the inventory of his business. As a result, he hopes to offer a wider variety of products to his customers so that he can improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of products for his store.

loans.name: Praxedes

texts.en:
Praxedes is 62 years old and married with four children.

Praxedes is in the agricultural business, raising cattle in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her cattle.

Praxedes has been raising cattle for five years now, and has borrowed nineteen times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Praxedes would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her cattle.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Gemma requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for three years now.

In the future, Gemma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Albertina

texts.en:
A $1,000 loan is offered to Albertina to improve her business. She is married, and she opened her local tradition in 2011 with her own working capital. She will use the loan to buy traditional clothes.

Albertina is generating a good income from selling. She has been thinking of running a big business after years of involving herself in doing business. Albertina is living in a town with her family.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothes.

loans.name: Gladys Esther

texts.es: Gladys día a día elabora deliciosos platillos desde su residencia ubicada en el Municipio de Tubará,  su idea de negocio fue promovida por su vecindario quienes le propusieron que colocara un Restaurante, entonces puso en marcha sus utensilios de cocina y su gran destreza en la cocina para que ellos pudieran deleitase todos los medios días con almuerzos caseros y comidas especiales.  Con gran entusiasmo y dedicación el éxito no se hizo esperar, tras tres años de funcionamiento su lista de comensales se incrementó a un buen número de referidos a quienes ofrece arroces, sopas, carnes, ensaladas y refrescos. En la actualidad se dedica de lunes a sábado en el horario de 8 a.m a 3 p.m. a su restaurante, está aplicando a su primer Credikiva, por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para invertir en la compra de víveres al por mayor; arroz, aceite, granos, carnes y verduras. Con esta inversión obtendrá descuentos por comprar volúmenes de contado. Gladys es madre de tres hijos y su meta familiar es remodelar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Gladys makes delicious dishes every day from her home, which is located in the municipality of Tubará. Her idea for the business came from her neighbors, who suggested to that she open a restaurant. She put her kitchen utensils and her great skill in the kitchen to good use, so that the neighbors could delight in homemade lunches and special dishes each mid-day. 

With great enthusiasm and dedication, success came quickly. After three years in business the list of referred diners has grown to a good number, to whom she offers rice dishes, soup, meats, salads and refreshments. Currently she devotes her time to her restaurant from Monday through Saturday, from 8 a.m. to 3 p.m. 

She is applying for her first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to invest in the purchase of supplies at wholesale: rice, oil, grains, meats and vegetables. With this investment she will obtain cash discounts to buy large volume.  Gladys is the mother of three children, and her goal for her family is to remodel her home.

loans.use: to buy supplies at wholesale: rice, oil, grains, meats and vegetables.

loans.name: Emanuel Isaias

texts.es:
Emanuel, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, está casado y vive con su madre, su padre, su hermana y su esposa que está embarazada.

Emanuel, trabaja en una empresa de internet desde hace cinco años, fue por un amigo de su padre que le dio la oportunidad de trabajar ahí, viaja a diferentes comunidades casi todos los días y su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 a.m. a 5:00 p.m.

Emanuel, necesita el dinero del crédito para comprar una motocicleta, la cual lo transportara todos los días a su trabajo, con esto mejorara en gran manera su transporte diario.

Emanuel, sueña con tener algún día su casa propia y un carro, en el que pueda pasear con su familia.
texts.en: Emanuel is 27 years old and studied up to Grade 9. He is married and lives with his mother, father, sister and wife who is pregnant. Emanuel has worked in an internet company for 5 years. It was through a friend of his father that he got the opportunity to work there. He travels to different communities each day and his timetable is from 7 am until 5 pm. Emanuel needs the money to buy a motorcycle and doing so improve his daily transportation greatly. Emanuel dreams of having his own house one day and a car which he can use to travel with his family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Rancho Loma Bonita Group

texts.es:
La comunidad del Estado de México de donde son originarios los  integrantes del grupo Rancho Loma Bonita es conocida por la riqueza de su paisaje natural. Los árboles frondosos se combinan en los grandes cerros en cuya cima se puede apreciar el basto cielo lleno de nubes blancas. Los habitantes se dedican tanto al cultivo de maíz como a la cría y engorda de animales de corral. 
   Mónica es una joven muy trabajadora que siempre muestra una actitud alegre. Desde hace dos años vive con su pareja Alfredo quien tuvo que viajar a otra comunidad por una buena oferta de empleo. Por lo tanto ahora Mónica es quien se encarga de la carnicería que su suegro abrió hace siete años. Ella compra las reces con los ganaderos locales pero el traslado de las mismas hasta su negocio es complicado por lo que aprecia mucho la ayuda de su suegro "Realmente el apoyo que recibo es muy importante para seguir con el negocio. Mi suegro me ayuda en todo este proceso, además él mismo sacrifica la res para poder vender la carne". La mejor venta la realiza los fines de semana y para ello prepara el producto desde el día anterior. 
   Mónica y Alfredo están muy contentos porque gracias a la oportunidad del préstamo su negocio sigue funcionado: "los animales son muy caros y con el beneficio del préstamo puedo comprar sin ninguna dificultad" comentó contenta, es por eso que el nuevo préstamo lo invertirá en más reces. Su más grande sueño es poder hacer crecer su negocio para que algún día, con sus propias ganancias, puedan adquirir un mayor número de animales sin dificultades.
   Los demás integrantes del grupo Rancho Loma Bonita son Don Adán y Ma. Guadalupe quienes manejan una tienda de abarrotes.

*La fotografía fue tomada en la tienda de Don Adán y Ma. Guadalupe, que es el punto de reunión del grupo. Mónica es quien viste suéter café, ella es la esposa de Alfredo quien se hace cargo del crédito y del negocio de su esposo.
texts.en:
The community in the state of Mexico where the members of the Rancho Loma Bonita group are from is known for the richness of its natural landscape. The lush trees come together on the large hills, from the tops of which the vast sky can be seen with its white clouds. The inhabitants grow corn as well as raise and fatten small farm animals.

Mónica is a very hard-working young woman who always displays a happy attitude. For two years, she has lived with her partner Alfredo, who had to travel to another community for a good job offer. Therefore Mónica is the one who is in charge of the meat market that her father-in-law opened seven years ago. "Really the support I receive is very important in order to continue with the business. My father-in-law helps me with this whole process, and he himself slaughters the cattle in order to be able to sell the meat." She sells the most on the weekends, and she prepares the product for it the previous day.

Mónica and Alfredo are very happy because thanks to the opportunity from the loan their business continues to function. "The animals are very expensive and with the benefit of the loan I can buy them without any difficulty," she notes happily, that is why the new loan will be invested in more cattle. Her biggest dream is to be able to grow her business so that one day, with their own earnings, they can acquire a larger number of animals with no difficulties.

The other members of the Rancho Loma Bonita group are Adán and Maria Guadalupe, who manage a grocery store.

The photograph was taken in Adán and Maria Guadalupe's store which is the meeting point of the group. Mónica, Alfredo's wife, is the one wearing the brown sweater; she is in charge of the loan and her husband's business.

loans.use: To buy more cattle

location.town: Guarda de la Laguinita, San Jose del Rincon

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is a 49-year-old widow with eight children, six of whom are currently in school. She is in the agricultural business in the Philippines, where she fattens pigs. Jasmin has requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Jasmin has been in pig fattening for three years now and has borrowed from NWTF four times in the past to sustain her business. In the future, she would like to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Homero

texts.es:
Homero tiene 54 años de edad, vive con su esposa y sus hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el Distrito de Callayuc, una comunidad de clima variado, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva café de la variedad catimore, se dedica a esta actividad desde que se caso, junto a su esposa han ido cultivando café y caña de azúcar lo que les ha permitido ingresos para el sustento de su familia. Homero ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una buena producción para ofrecer a sus clientes lo que incrementará su nivel de ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Homero is 54 years old. He lives with his wife and children in their own house made from rustic materials in the district of Callayuc. It is a community with a varied climate and it's inhabitants work in agriculture, commerce and raising cattle. It is located in the province of Cutervo which belongs to Cajamarca region in the North Andes of Peru.

He works in agriculture growing Catimore varietal coffee. He has been in this business since he married. Together with his wife he grows coffee and sugar cane which allows him to generate income to sustain his family. Homero has requested a loan to buy manure and fertilizer to provide maintenance for his coffee crops and in this way have good production to offer his clients. That would increase his level of income and in the end improve his quality of living and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer to provide maintenance for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Jose Milo

texts.es:
José Milo tiene 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad de clima variado ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú. Los pobladores de esta comunidad se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería principalmente.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercializacion de ganado vacuno, posee seis vacas de su propiedad, se dedica a la actividad hace ocho años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en el rubro. Adicionalmente se dedica a la construcción siendo maestro de obra en distrito. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de ganado para incrementar su negocio, con ello obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
José Milo is 43 years old and lives with his wife and children in a rural area of the Santo Tomás district. This region has a diverse climate and is located in the Cutervo province, which belongs to the Cajamarca region, a mountain range north of Peru. The inhabitants of this community mainly work in the agriculture and cattle raising industries. 

He raises and sells cattle for a living and currently has six cows on his land. He has been doing this for eight years and has experience in this line of work. He also works in construction as a foreman in the area. The purpose of this loan will be to buy a large quantity of cattle to boost his business. With this loan he will be able to earn a higher income, which will enable him to improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of cattle to boost his business

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en:
Rosalie is a 35-year-old married woman with two children who are both in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur who has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

Rosalie has been in this business for three years. In the future, she would like to save enough money to be able to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Aracely Del Carmen

texts.es:
Aracely, de 33 años de edad, está casada y vive con su esposo y sus dos pequeños hijos, de los cuales solo uno estudia y su pareja es mecánico desde hace un par de años.

Aracely, se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace más de 5 años, fue una amiga que le propuso que colocara un negocio de venta y fue así como fue motivada a hacerlo.

Aracely, está solicitando el crédito para comprar más mercadería como camisas, pantalones, calcetines y otros productos para la venta de ropa.

El sueño de Aracely, es que a un futuro sus dos pequeños hijos, lleguen a ser profesionales y también desea poder tener su propio puesto de ropa y de zapatos.
texts.en:
Aracely is 33 years old, married and lives with her husband and two young children. Only one of her children studies. Her husband has been a mechanic for a couple of years.

Aracely has worked in clothing sales for over five years. She was motivated by her friend who suggested she start a business.

Aracely requests a loan to buy more merchandise including shirts, pants, socks and other products to sell.

Aracely's dream is for her two children to become professional and for her to have her own outpost for clothes and shoes.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise including shirts, pants, socks and other products to sell.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
María, de 37 años de edad, estudio hasta noveno grado, debido a que sus padres no tenía suficiente ingresos económicos, es madre soltera y tiene cuatro hijos de 19, 17, 14 y 11 años de edad, los dos últimos se encuentran estudiando en nivel básico y los mayores estudiaron hasta bachillerato.

María, se dedica a la producción de granos básicos, está actividad la aprendió de sus padres cuando ella era soltera, actualmente la ejerce con sus hijos, para el sustento se la familia.
    
María, está solicitando un préstamo para comprar fertilizantes para la producción de sandía y maíz. 

El sueño de María, es que sus hijos tengan una mejor estabilidad económica que la que ella tuvo.
texts.en: María is 37 years old and studied up to Grade 9 as her parents didn't have sufficient economic resources. She is a single mother and has four children aged 19, 17, 14 and 11 years old. The two youngest are studying their basic education and the older ones are in secondary school. María works growing basic grains. She learned this work from her parents when she was single. Now she does it with her children to sustain the family. María is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer for her watermelon and corn production. María's dream is for her children to have more economic stability than what she had.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for her watermelon and corn production.

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina always dreamed of opening and managing her own retail store to support her needs. She also cultivated a rice land with her husband in Mahayag, in the Philippines.

Recently, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic inventory items like sugar, oil, milk and canned goods and to buy rice fertilizer. She is now on her way to repaying the loan and supporting her children with her new profits.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic inventory items like sugar, oil, milk and canned goods and to buy rice fertilizer

loans.name: Aleth

texts.en:
Aleth, 38, is married and has six children, four of whom are still in school. For the past ten years she has earned an income by fishing.

Aleth has applied for a 15,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy fishing equipment such as nets, plus gasoline for her boat. She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fishing equipment such as nets, plus gasoline for her boat.

loans.name: Lyndiane 3 Group

texts.fr: Ce banc villageois est inauguré le 09 mai 2007. Ce groupe est constitué de 19 membres. Elles s'activent toutes dans le petit commerce. Elles remboursent toujours leurs prêts sans difficultés. Madame Donatienne qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est veuve, âgée de 52 ans et mère de six enfants dont quatre garçons et deux filles. Elle s'active dans la vente d'huile de palme et de citron depuis plusieurs années. Le prêt sollicité va lui permettre de renfoncer son activité pour mieux satisfaire sa clientèle. Les bénéfices vont servir à prendre en charge sa famille(scolarité, nourriture et santé).
texts.en:
This banc villageois was founded on May 9, 2007. The group is made up of 19 members who run small businesses. The group members always repay their loans without issue.

Mrs. Donatienne, raising her hand at right in the photo, is the group's representative. She is 52 years old, a widow, and the mother of six children, four boys and two girls. She has been selling palm oil and lemons for several years. The requested loan will allow Mrs. Donatienne to strengthen her business and better satisfy her customers. The profits will go toward caring for Mrs. Donatienne's family (school fees, food, and health costs).

loans.use: To purchase palm oil and lemons.

loans.name: Marfe Julie

texts.en:
Marfe Julie is 61 years old and single. For the past twelve years she has raised and sold chickens to make a living.

As a member of Kiva's field partner NWTF Marfe Julie has borrowed and successfully repaid ten previous loans. Now she is applying for a 23,000 PHP loan to buy chicken feed and other supplies for her business. She is working hard to continue developing her chicken ranch.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed and other supplies for her business.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia, 53, is married and has four children, three of whom are currently in school. For the past ten years she has sold fish to make a living.

Alicia has applied for a 15,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers. She would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Jesús Ana

texts.es:
Ana, de 73 años de edad, es una señora muy responsable y visionaria, así como también emprendedora, tuvo 2 hijos, estudio hasta cuarto grado, está acompañada y su esposo es mecánico.

Ana, por motivos de tiempo y de recursos económicos, se dedicó a la venta de productos industriales, para ayudar a sus padres a generar ingresos para la alimentación de todos; ahora, es comerciante y tiene una tienda en su casa. 

Ella, necesita el crédito para comprar productos como jabón, shampoo, cepillos dentales, café, pan, arroz y frijoles para la tienda, con estos productos podrá surtirla y satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

Su principal sueño, es mantener su negocio bien surtido y cubrir las necesidades básicas de su casa.
texts.en:
Ana is a responsible, visionary and enterprising 73 year old woman. She studied up to Grade 4. She has two children. She is married and her husband is a mechanic. Ana for reasons of time and economic resources worked selling industrial products to help her parents to generate the income to feed everyone.

Now she is a merchant and has a store in her house. She needs a loan to buy products like soap. shampoo, toothbrushes, coffee, bread, rice and beans for her store. With these products she can stock her store and satisfy the needs of her customers. Her main dream is to keep her store well-stocked and pay for the basic necessities for her household.

loans.use: to buy products like soap. shampoo, toothbrushes, coffee, bread, rice and beans for her store.

loans.name: Abdullo

texts.ru: Абдулло трудолюбивый и ответственный дехканин. Он сам работает на своей земле и кормит свою семью своим нажитом трудом. Абдулло 32 лет. У него  жена и дети. Несмотря на свой возраст, он трудится все время, чтобы прокормить свою семью. Абдулло на своем земельном участке выращивает помидоры. Он посадил помидоры, и готовится к обработке урожай минеральными удобрениями. И для купли минеральных удобрений нужно средства, которых у него нет, поэтому он срочно нуждается в деньгах. Абдулло надеется на Вашу поддержку. Он заранее выражает свою благодарность.
texts.en: Abdullo is a hardworking and responsible farmer. He works on his own land, and feeds his family through his labor. Abdullo is 32 years old, but in spite of his age, he works all the time in order to feed his family. Abdullo grows tomatoes on his own plot of land. He has planted tomatoes, and is preparing to cultivate the harvest with mineral fertilizers. He does not currently have the funds to buy the mineral fertilizers needed, therefore he is in urgent need of money. Abdullo is hoping for your support, and expresses his gratitude in advance.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers.

loans.name: Gulmurot

texts.ru: Гулмурот тот человек, про которого говорят честный, ответственный заботливый мужчина. Ему 61 лет, он из района Кубадиен. Гулмурот дехканин, и он работает на своей земле и выращивает картошку и помидоры.  Сейчас Гулмурот готовится летнему посеву. Для посева нужны деньги для купли семена урожай и минеральные удобрения. По этой причине он берет кредит. Гулмурот старается одеть, кормить и дать образования своим троим детям. И ему помогают его старшие два сына, которые они занимается сельскохозяйственной деятельностью. Его жена и невестка домохозяйка. Гулмурот старается быть успешным человеком.
texts.en: Gulmurot is the sort of person that people describe as an honest, responsible and caring man. He is 61 years old and he is from the Qubadiyon region. Gulmurot is a farmer and he works on his own land. He grows potatoes and tomatoes. Now Gulmurot is preparing for the summer sowing. He needs money to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer. For this reason he is taking a loan. Gulmurot strives to clothe, feed and educate his three children. And his elder two sons help him in doing the agricultural work. His wife and daughter-in-law are home-makers. Gulmurot is trying to be a successful person.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Yuani

texts.es:
Yuani tiene 52 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive en casa propia en una zona rural del distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad dedicada a la crianza de animales y comercio que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como gallinas, patos, cuyes, entre otros, realiza esta actividad desde hace 10 años, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su domicilio. Solicita préstamo para realizar arreglos de su corral así como para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio, esto con la finalidad de incrementar su negocio de los mismos y satifacer las necesidades de sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos que van a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Yuani is 52 years of age and is in a common law marriage. she resides in her own house in a rural zone dedicated to animal raising and commerce in Oyotun district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on Peru's north coast. 

Yuani raises and sells corral animals such as hens, ducks, and guinea pigs, among others. She has been engaged in this activity for some 10 years. Her business in located at her home. 

Yuani is requesting a loan to make repairs on her pens and to purchase a larger quantity of animals for her business. Her wishes to expand her present business and satisfy the demands of her customers, which will generate larger income and improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to repair her pens, and to purchase a larger quantity of animals for her business.

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es: Don Manuel de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida, el se dedica al cultivo de arroz y maíz tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la actividad agrícola la cual inicio con capital propio  y gracias a ese trabajo es como el ha podido salir adelante, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semilla, fertilizantes, foliares, insecticidas y herbicidas para producir una mejor cosecha ya si tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Manuel is 61 years old and lives in his own house with his life companion. He works growing rice and corn. He has 20 years working in this business which he started with his own capital and thanks to this work he has been able to get ahead. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, foliar sprays, insecticides and herbicides to produce a better harvest and have greater economic income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, foliar spray, insecticides and herbicides.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
YACOUBA est le Monsieur qui tient le mouton sur la photo. C’est un cultivateur malien, non scolarisé, âgé de 40 ans et père de 5 enfants de 12 à 6 ans dont 2 vont à l’école.
Il exerce l’élevage de mouton il y a plus de 10 ans. YACOUBA s’approvisionne en moutons dans les marchés de sa localité et revend dans les mêmes marchés. Le profit qu’il en tire lui permet de satisfaire aux besoins de sa famille.
YACOUBA prend le prêt au RMCR pour acheter beaucoup de moutons pour vendre. Malgré qu’il soit  souvent confronté au problème d’augmentation du prix des animaux lors de l’approvisionnement, il se sent à l’aise d’exercer cette activité car il se voit occuper.
YACOUBA rêve de devenir un grand éleveur et exportateur des bœufs dans les jours à venir
texts.en:
Yacouba is the gentleman holding the sheep in the photo. He is a farmer from Mali who did not attend school. He is 40 years old and the father of five children between the ages of six and 12, two of whom attend school.

Yacouba has been raising sheep for more than 10 years. He gets his sheep from the local markets and resells them in the same markets. The profit he makes allows him to meet his family's needs. Yacouba is taking this loan from RMCR in order to purchase many sheep to sell. Although he is frequently faced with the problem of increasing prices when it comes to procuring animals, he is at ease in this business because it ensures that he has work.

Yacouba dreams of becoming a major breeder and exporter of cattle in the future.

loans.use: To purchase sheep to sell.

loans.name: Juan Elias

texts.es:
Juan, es carpintero, elabora muebles por solicitud especial de clientes y también para tener a la venta; está soltero, vive con sus padres y estudia en la universidad, su negocio nace con el propósito de ayudar con los gastos familiares y tener recursos económicos para costear sus estudios, uno de sus hermanos le apoyo con capital para comprar parte de las herramientas, los trabajos los realiza con la ayuda de dos empleados, cuenta con pedidos de personas vecinas y de comerciales, no representa dificultades en la administración de su negocio.
Está solicitando un crédito para comprar una cierra eléctrica y madera, así mismo invertirá en la remodelación del local en que tiene su negocio, pretende aumentar su productividad y tener nuevos ingresos para beneficiarse junto a su familia.
Sus aspiraciones son establecer mejor su negocio con una buena imagen, contar con la fidelidad de sus clientes y culminar su carrera universitaria para apoyar a su familia a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Juan is a carpenter and makes furniture by special request from customers and also to sell. He is single, lives with his parents, and is studying at the university. He started his business in order to help with his family's expenses and to have the financial resources to pay for his studies. One of his brothers helped him with capital to buy some of the tools. He does his work with the help of two employees. He has requests from various neighbors and other businesses. He doesn't have any difficulty managing his business.

He is asking for a loan to buy an electric sealer and wood, and to invest in remodeling the place where he has his business. He intends to increase his productivity and have new earnings to benefit him and his family. His aspirations are to establish his business better with a good image, to count on his customers' loyalty, and to finish his university degree to support his family in getting ahead.

loans.use: to buy an electric sealer and wood, and to invest in remodeling the place where he has his business

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José de 34 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida en una empresa cercana en la que presta sus servicios, actividad que le permite llevar el pan de cada día a su familia. José vive con su compañera de vida y su hijo de 2 años de edad en vivienda propia. José siempre pensando en lo mejor para su familia ha decidido construir dos cuartos dormitorio en su vivienda, ya que no cuenta con un lugar adecuado en el cual descansar luego de sus largas jornadas de trabajo, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, ladrillo, grava, hierro y arena para construir dos cuartos dormitorios en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Jose, 34 years old, is a hard-working man who earns his living in a nearby enterprise where he offers his services, an activity that permits him to provide his family's daily bread. Jose lives with his life's companion and his 2-year-old son in his own small home.

Jose always wanted the best for his family and, now, he has decided to construct two bedrooms in his house, since it doesn't currently have an adequate place to sleep after his long day's work. For that reason, he is requesting a loan through FUSAI to purchase cement, bricks, gravel, iron, and sand in order to construct two bedrooms in his home.

loans.use: to invest in cement, bricks, gravel, iron, and sand for constructing two bedrooms in his home.

loans.name: Aracelys

texts.es: Gracias por continuar apoyando la labor de Aracelys, mediante su anterior credikiva compró vitrina exhibidora de productos que surtió con nuevos artículos de su oferta, los cuales beneficiaron las ventas y fortaleció su capital de trabajo e infraestructura; por eso envía un mensaje a sus financiadores de Kiva “Muchas gracias por este apoyo tan importante para mí, sigan apoyándome para continuar progresando”. Nuevamente está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual responderá a la demanda de unos pedidos de productos que su clientela le han solicitado, inversión que será de gran éxito, puesto que se encuentra en su temporada alta por las celebraciones que se aproximan.
texts.en:
Thank you for continuing to support the work of Aracelys. Through her previous Kiva loan, she bought a class display case she filled with new items, which benefited sales and increased her working capital and infrastructure. Because of this, she sends a message to her Kiva lenders: "Thank you for this support, which is so important to me. Please continue to support me so I can keep progressing." 

Aracelys is requesting another loan, with which she will fulfill the demand of some product orders that her customers have requested. The investment will be very successful, since it is high season for holidays approaching.

loans.use: to purchase product orders from her customers.

loans.name: Sandra

texts.pt:
A senhora Sandra  de 28 anos, é  comerciante, solteira, tem 02 filhos, 01 em idade escolar, a frequentar o ensino primario, o outro é  menor de idade, vive na casa cedida pelos pais  .
Diz que com este credito ira comprar  mantas, duvetos, bolsas, para reforçar o seu negocio. 
Ter uma casa propria, uma Boutique e terminar com os estudos é o maior sonho  .
Principais desafios insufienciencia de fundos, doencas, e elevado custo de vida para ultrapassa los  ira levantar mais creditos como forma de alcancar seus objectivos.
texts.en:
Sandra is a 28 year old businesswoman who is single and has two children, one of whom is school aged and goes to primary school and the other is still too young to go to school. She lives in the house her parents left to her.

Sandra says that this loan will go towards buying blankets, doonas and bags to restock her business. Her greatest dream is to have her own home, a boutique and to finish her studies. Sandra's main challenges are insufficient funds, illness and the high cost of living that she will have to overcome to apply for more loans so she can achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy blankets, doonas and bags

loans.name: Chhoem

texts.en:
Chhoem, 58, lives in a community of Pursat Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of ten children. 

To make a living and support her family, Chhoem manages and operates a farming business on a small rice farmland which is located near her house. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 6 a day. 

Chhoem wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use because there is no latrine in her house now. Therefore, she is borrowing a loan from Kiva to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. 

She is thankful for the loan granted through Hattha Kaksekar Limited (HKL) with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine.

loans.name: Aracelli

texts.en: Aracelli is from Katipunan and married. She joined PMPC in order to access the programs and services of the said coop. Recently she accessed her third loan in the amount of PHP 20,000, for additional working capital to buy a variety of grocery items for her existing business, which sells a variety of food and non-food products in the local community.

loans.use: to buy a variety of grocery items for her existing business.

loans.name: Cacilda

texts.pt:
A Senhora Cacilda é avicultora, casada mae de 7 filhos dos quais 5 ja maiores de idade e independentes  sustenta 2 filhos que vivem com ela na casa propria.
O montante sera aplicado na compra de pintos, racoes e vacinas  para  a criacao de frangos. 
No futuro pretende comprar uma viatura para transporte de frangos  para revender no Mercado que e um pouco distante do local onde cria.
Principais desafios insuficiência de fundos e elevado custo de vida, para ultrapassá-los que irá levantar mais créditos como forma de alcançar seus objectivos .
texts.en:
Cacilda is a poultry farmer who is married and the mother of seven children of whom five are now adults and independent. She supports her two children who live with her in her own home.

This loan will be used to buy chicks, feed and vaccines to raise chickens. In the future Cacilda hopes to buy a vehicle to transport her chickens to resell in the market which is a bit far from the place where she raises them.  Her main challenges are insufficient funds and the high cost of living which she will have to overcome to apply for more loans to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy chicks, feed and vaccines

loans.name: Florentina

texts.pt:
A senhora Florentina tem 51 anos de idade, é casada maritalmente operaria agricola mae de 4 filhos  1 maior de idade e independente 3 a estudar no ensino primario e secundario, vive na casa propria ainda em construcao. 
Com o valor do crédito pretende comprar cimento, barrotes e chapa de zinco para dar continuidade a sua obra.
Tem como sonho casar oficilamente, ampliar a sua casa e adiquirir uma viatura para uso pessoal.
O seu maior desafio e a insuficiencia de fundos mas diz que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para tal vai pagar pontualmente .
texts.en:
Florentina is 51 years old, in a de facto relationship and is a farm labourer. She is the mother of four children, one of whom is an adult and three who are studying at high school and primary school. She lives in her own home that is still under construction. 

With this loan Florentina hopes to buy cement, iron bars and metal sheeting to continue building. Her dream is to get married officially, extend her house and acquire a vehicle for personal use. Her biggest challenge is having insufficient funds but she says that she aims to apply for more loans so she will pay this loan on time.

loans.use: to buy cement, iron bars and metal sheeting

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es:
Rafael es un agricultor de 48 años, casado con Elida con quien han procreado dos hijos, Rafael se dedica a la producción de café, el tiene 15 años de experiencia en el rubro y a adoptado el café como su principal fuente de ingresos, Rafael sueña con darles a sus hijos una educación de calidad que puedan tener las oportunidades que él no ah tenido.
La producción de café bajo sellos de certificación orgánica y comercio justo son algo novedoso en la región ya que los sellos dan un valor agregado al producto, la comercialización es más fácil y se protege la diversidad de la zona. 
Rafael solicita un crédito para convertir 0.75 hectareas de cafetal a producción orgánica para lo que él quiere replantar en su totalidad cafetal y aprovechando que las fincas están deterioradas por la edad y las plagas este es el momento oportuno, con la conversión a orgánico Rafael obtendrá mejores un precios por su café y asegura mercado para su cosecha.
Rafael solicita un crédito para comprar todo lo necesario en la conversión a orgánico de su cafetal, como ser: Plantas de café, Abonos orgánicos, insumos orgánicos, y pago de mano de obra.
texts.en:
Rafael is a 48 year old farmer. He is married to Elida and they have two children. Rafael grows coffee. He has 15 years of experience in this field and coffee is now his main source of income. 

He wants to give his children a quality education so that they may have opportunities he did not have. 

Producing coffee labeled certified organic and free trade is something new in the area. The seals give an added value to the product, marketing it is easier and it protects the diversity of the area. 

Rafael is requesting a loan to convert 0.75 hectares to an organic plantation. He wants to entirely replant the coffee plantation and take advantage of this opportune time that the land is deteriorating due to age and plagues.

With the conversion to organic, Rafael will receive a better price for his coffee and assure a market for his harvest. 

Rafael is requesting a loan to buy everything necessary for the conversion to an organic coffee plantation such as coffee plants, organic fertilizers, organic supplies and labor.

loans.use: to buy everything necessary for the conversion to an organic coffee plantation such as coffee plants, organic fertilizers, organic supplies and labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in paints, tiles, wooden boxes, colored papers etc. in order to increase her ornaments and crafts.

loans.name: Helena

texts.pt:
A senhora Helena tem 35 anos de idade,  é   mãe solteira de 2 filhos, 1 dos quais a frequentar o ensino primario outro o secundario tem 2 irmaos sob sua responsabilidade e vive com ele na sua casa própria.
Diz que com o valor do empréstimo irá comprar pneus para a manuntenção de seu tractor agricola que tem usa do para lavoura das machambas da comunidade onde vive em forma de prestação de serviços.
Seus sonhos e esperanças para o futuro são comprar mais tractores para aumentar ao rendimento familia.
Diz e tem como desafios a insuficiência de fundos  e para ultrapassar esta situação faz tambem negocio de venda de produtos de 1a necessidade e que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para concretizar o seu sonho.
texts.en:
Helena is 35 years old and a single mother to two children, one of whom goes to primary school and the other high school. She has two siblings under her care and they live with her in her own home. 

Helena says that with the money from this loan she will buy tyres to maintain her tractor which she uses to work the plots in the community where she lives and offers her services. 

Helena's hopes and dreams for the future are to buy more tractors to increase the family income. She says that her challenge is having insufficient funds but to overcome this situation she also runs a store selling basic needs products. Helena plans to apply for more loans to turn her dreams into reality.

loans.use: to buy tyres

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is aged 52, married, and they're blessed with three children. She has sold fish in their village for almost twelve years and earns a net income of PHP 1,200 a day. Her net income from this business is usually spent on the school allowances of her two grandchildren. 

Due to inadequate capital in her business, she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 28,000 to purchase fish to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow productively and profitably.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Analie

texts.en:
Analie is 35 years old and has four children. She is married and has two children who are still in school. Analie is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. 

She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig. Analie has been in this business for two years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Zosima

texts.en:
Zosima is 57 years old and married with three children. She is in the agricultural business of pig fattening in the Philippines. Zosima has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

She has been in pig fattening for five years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. Zosima would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
Jose tiene 33 años de edad, vive con su cónyuge y sus dos hijos en casa propia de material rústico en el distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

El se dedica al cultivo de café variedad catimore resistente a enfermedades y plagas, su plantación esta en segundo año de producción, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 5 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en el rubro y con buenas referencias en su comunidad. Tambien se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como gallinas, cuyes, cerdos, entre otros y al cultivo de productos como yuca, plátano, menestras, etc. El destino del crédito será para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para brindar mantenimiento a su cultivo de café, con esto el espera ofrecer un café de mejor calidad a sus clientes lo que se verá reflejado en un mayor volumen de ventas y por ende obtendrá mayores ingresos para así poder mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Jose, 33, lives with his partner and two children in his own house made of rustic material in the Santo Tomás district. 

This is a community dedicated to farming and livestock and is located in the Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.
 
He grows a Catimore variety coffee which is resistant to disease and plagues. His plantation is in its second year of production. He has been doing this type of work for the past 5 years so he has experience in this field and has good references in his community. 

He also raises small animals such as chickens, guinea pigs, pigs etc. and grows products such as yucca, plantain, beans etc.
 
He is requesting a loan to buy fertilizers in order to maintain his coffee crops. He hopes to offer a better quality coffee to his clients which will mean a larger volume of sales and a larger income and in this way improve the quality of life for him and his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers in order to maintain his coffee crops.

loans.name: Armando

texts.pt:
O senhor Armando  tem 32 anos de idade é casado, pai de 03 filhos, dos quais 1 frequenta o ensino primario, os outros 2 ainda sem idade escolar,é responsavel pela mae em inhambane,actualmente é supervisor duma empresa de seguranca vive na casa propria.
Com o valor do emprestimo diz que  vai comprar areia, pedra, cimento, e pagar a mao-de-obra para dar continuidade da sua obra.
O projecto para o futuro, concluir a sua casa para oferecer um lar melhor  a sua familia e futuramente comprar uma viatura e abrir uma mercearia para aumentar a renda familiar .
O seu maior desafio e a insuficiencia de fundos mas diz que ira solicitar mais emprestimos para tal vai pagar pontualmente.
texts.en:
Armando is 32 years old, married and the father of three children, one of whom goes to primary school and the other two are still too young to go to school. He is responsible for his mother in Inhambane. He currently works as a supervisor of an insurance company and lives in his own home. 

With the money from this loan Armando says that he will buy sand, stone, cement, and pay for labour to continue building. His plans for the future are to finish his house to provide his family with a better home and in the future to buy a vehicle and open a grocery store to increase the family income. Armando's biggest challenge is a lack of funds but he says that he plans to apply for more loans so he will pay this loan on time.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement paving stones and pay for labour

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia works hard to support her family. She is married with two children and has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Cecilia has been in this business for five years now, and also earns additional income from a general store. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Evelyn has been in this business for 11 years now. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine is 48 years old and has eight children. She is married and has three children who are presently in school. Geraldine is in the agricultural business of raising pigs in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies to raise her pig.

Geraldine has been in this business for 21 years now, and has borrowed five times in the past from NWTF to sustain it. She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her business. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccines, and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Luz Esther

texts.es:
Con su sonrisa y gran corazón, Luz ha tenido una gran acogida en su barrio desde que abrió su restaurante hace 3 años con gran esfuerzo y con un deseo en su mente, el de salir adelante y mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
El crédito que solicita es para comprar insumos e ingredientes como Pescado, queso y yuca.
Con estos ingredientes podrá continuar cocinando y preparando las delicias que con sus manos trabajadoras ha venido ofreciendo y sirviendo.
Su principal dificultad es el Alto costo de los insumos.
Apoya a Luz con su negocio y has que su vida sea mejor con un préstamo!
texts.en: With her smile and big heart, Luz has had a big welcome in her neighborhood. She opened her restaurant three years ago, with hard work and one desire, that of getting ahead and improving her family’s living conditions.  She is requesting the loan to purchase supplies and ingredients such as fish, cheese, and yucca.  With these ingredients, she will be able to continue cooking and preparing the delicacies that she has been offering and serving with her own hardworking hands.  Her main challenge is the high cost of supplies.  Please support Luz with her business and make her life better with a loan!

loans.use: to purchase supplies and ingredients such as fish, cheese, and yucca.

loans.name: Algermiro Francisco

texts.es:
30 años de experiencia hablan por sí solos de la calidad, no solo del servicio, sino también del trabajo que desempeña Algemiro en su cerrajería, siendo una persona muy reconocida en el barrio por su larga trayectoria.
Le dedica 12 horas diarias a su negocio.
Es un hombre muy trabajador e inicio este negocio por gusto y vocación, aparte de ser una fuente de ingresos para la educación de sus hijos. 

Por esta razón quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra de una maquina soldadora portátil, lo que hará que su trabajo sea más eficiente y así permitir la sostenibilidad de su negocio y el aumento de sus ventas.

Es padre de 5 hijos los cuales los tuvo con su actual esposa; su familia le ha servido como fuente de inspiración y fortaleza para sacar su negocio adelante y espera seguir con su actividad ofertando sus servicios de cerrajero a todo aquel que lo necesite.
texts.en:
30 years of experience speak for themselves not only regarding the quality or service, but also of the work Algermiro does as a locksmith. He is well-known in the neighborhood for his long career. He works at his business for 12 hours a day. He is a hardworking man and started this business by choice and vocation, apart from being a source of income for the education of his children.

This is why he wants to apply for a loan to purchase a portable welding machine, which will make his work more efficient and allow for the sustainability of his business and increased sales.

Algermiro is the father of 5 children with his wife; his family has served as a source of inspiration and strength to take his business forward, and he looks forward to continuing to offer his locksmith services to anyone who needs it.

loans.use: to purchase a portable welding machine, which will make his work more efficient.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 27 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la siembra de güisquil tiene 5 años de dedicarse a esa actividad a causa del desempleo, gracias a su trabajo es como el ha podido salir adelante, el joven vive en casa propia con su compañera de vida y sus dos hijos, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono, fertilizantes y controles de plagas y así poder continuar con su trabajo para tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
The young man whose face is pixelated is 27 years old and lives in a high-risk area. He has been cultivating chayote squash for five years and started in this line of work because he was unemployed. Thanks to his efforts, he has been able to get ahead. This young man lives in his own home along with his life companion and their two children.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy compost, fertilizers, and pest controls so that he can continue his work and enjoy a better quality of life along with his family.

loans.use: to buy compost, fertilizers, and pest controls.

loans.name: Claudia Lisseth

texts.es: Claudia de 34 años de edad  habita en casa propia desde hace 13 años junto a su esposo y sus dos hijos a los que ha logrado sacar adelante con mucho esfuerzo y determinación por lo que se siente orgullosa. Ella se dedica a vender pan, y es por su amabilidad que es recomendada cada día con más personas, por lo que cuenta ya con muchos clientes. Claudia desea construir un muro de protección para el corredor de su casa porque es vulnerable para su seguridad y la de su familia además  el agua ingresa en el invierno es por eso que ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, hierro, arena, ladrillos y mano de obra para la construcción de un muro de protección frene a su vivienda.
texts.en:
Claudia, 34, has lived in her own home for the past 13 years with her husband and their two children. She is very proud of the fact that she has been able to get them ahead with much effort and determination.

She sells bread and it is thanks to her good nature that more and more people recommend her every day. Therefore she has many clients. 

Claudia would like to build a protective wall for the length of her home in order to protect her family. 
 
Also,  water seeps in during the winter which is why she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest it in cement, iron, sand, bricks and labor in order to build a protective wall in the front of her house.

loans.use: to invest it in cement, iron, sand, bricks and labor in order to build a protective wall in the front of her house.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is a married woman with two children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Mary Jane is 29 years old and has one child who is currently in school. She has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

Mary Jane has requested a PHP 15,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more packs of local food delicacies to sell to her customers. She has been in this business for six years. Mary Jane would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more packs of local food delicacies to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.en:
Hilda is 55 years old and married with one child. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 27,000 loan through NWTF to buy items of groceries like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

Hilda has been in this business for seven years. She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items of groceries like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Magdalina

texts.en:
Magdalina is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Magdalina is 51 years old and has two children who are still in school. She has a food vending business in the Philippines. 

Magdalina has requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients like spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc. for her business. She has been in this business for three years. In the future, Magdalina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like spices, vegetables, meat, fish, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for school fees

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is 53 years old and married with eight children. With two children who are presently in school, Josefa works very hard to provide for them. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 16,000 loan through NWTF to buy items of groceries like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc. 

Josefa has been in this business for 20 years. She would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items of groceries like canned goods, noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Maria tiene 41 años de edad, es madre soltera, vive con su menor hijo de 2 años de edad en la parte rural del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad dedicada a la agricultura y ganadería que se encuentra ubicada en la provincia de Jaén, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú.

Ella se dedica al comercio, vende articulos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, aceite, fideos, entre otros, su negocio se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio. El destino del crédito será para la compra de una mayor cantidad de productos para incrementar el stock de su negocio, con esto ella espera ofrecer una mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes lo que le va a permitir obtener mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Maria is 41 years old and a single mother.  She lives with her youngest son, two-years-old, in a rural area in the district of Pucará, where people work in agriculture and livestock farming. This community is located in the province of Jaén, region of Cajamarca, in the northern mountains of Peru.

Maria works selling basic food products such as rice, sugar, oil, pasta, and more. Her business is located at home.

This loan is to buy more products to stock up her store. This will allow  her to offer a wider range of items for sale to her clients, thereby increasing her income and improving the quality of life for her and her family,

loans.use: to buy more products to stock up her business.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine is 35 years old and has two children. She is married and has one child presently in school.

Josephine is in the agricultural business, pig fattening in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 24,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Josephine has been in this business for three years now, and has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, vaccine and other supplies to raise her pigs

loans.name: Libertad

texts.en:
Libertad is 66 years old and married with six children. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Libertad runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell like noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, canned goods and other personal care products.

Libertad has been in this business for six years. 

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell like noodles, spices, milk, coffee, drinks, canned goods and other personal care products

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia works hard to support her family. She is married and has a food vending business in the Philippines.

Emelia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

She has been in this business for 13 years now.

Emelia would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Ma. Leah

texts.en:
Ma. Leah is a married woman with three children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Ma. Leah is 36 years old and has three children are still in school.

Ma. Leah has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more fish to sell in her food stall.

Ma. Leah has been in this business for eight years. She would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell in her food stall

loans.name: Mercilita

texts.en:
Mercilita is 69 years old, married, and has two children.

Mercilita is in the agricultural business, farming vegetables in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizer, seeds and other farm supplies.

Mercilita has been in this business for 10 years now, and has borrowed 3 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, seeds and other farm supplies

loans.name: Francy Johana

texts.es:
Francy es una mujer emprendedora y dinámica de 25 años de edad, comerciante independiente; ya que desde hace 3 años comenzó a vender mercancía a sus familiares, amigos y compañeros, con el fin de generar ingresos para aportar a la economía de su hogar.

El crédito que solicita es un apoyo para fortalecer su negocio, pues invertirá el dinero en la compra de surtido al por mayor como productos de uso personal, jeans, camisas, camisetas, entre otros, brindando mayor variedad y un mejor servicio a sus clientes, lo que hará más rentable su negocio.
Trabaja sola todos los días durante 3 horas.

Francy tiene el firme propósito de sacar adelante su proyecto productivo, pues quiere convertirse en una empresaria exitosa y garantizar una mejor calidad de vida y bienestar para su grupo familiar y sabe que con los prestamistas de Kiva y la Corporación Interactuar puede lograr todo eso y más.
texts.en:
Francy is an entrepreneurial and dynamic 25 year old woman. She is an independent businesswoman who three years ago started selling merchandise to her family, friends and colleagues with the goal of generating income to support the household income. 

She is requesting a loan to strengthen her business. She will invest the money in wholesale inventory such as jeans, shirts, blouses etc.
