This will allow her to have a better variety and a better service to her clients which will make her business more profitable. 
She works by herself every day for 3 hours. 

Francy has a strong desire to improve her business. She wants to become a successful businesswoman and guarantee a better quality of life for her family. 

She knows that with the Kiva and Corporacion Interactuar lenders she can do this and more.

loans.use: to buy wholesale inventory such as jeans, shirts, blouses etc.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
Mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda y pagar la educación de sus hijos son los grandes sueños de Karina, que con su negocio de café ibnternet esta intentando cultivar y cumplir.

Trabaja todos los días 12 horas para obtener los ingresos necesarios a través de la prestación de sus servicios.

Solicita un apoyo económico para la reparación de uno de sus equipos de computo y para la compra de una impresora.
texts.en: To make improvements on her house and to pay for the education of her children are Karina's big dreams and with her internet cafe she is trying to accomplish that. She works every day for 12 hours to get the income she needs by renting out her services. She is requesting economic support to repair one of her computers and to buy a printer.

loans.use: repair one of her computers and buy a printer.

loans.name: Zhanyl

texts.ru: Жаныл, 27 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дополнительного дохода она занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и целеустремленности Жаныл, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется земельный участок мерою 2,59 ГА, где она выращивает фасоль и картофель для реализации оптовым покупателям. Экологически чистые и очень вкусные овощи пользуются большим спросом. Также в хозяйстве есть 2 коровы и 15 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян картофеля для посадки и выращивания. Доходы от кредита Жаныл планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса, она хочет отремонтировать свой дом.
texts.en: Zhanyl is 27, married, and a mother to two children. She has a high school education and works in farming and raising livestock for additional income. Thanks to her diligent work and determination, Zhanyl now has a 2.59 hectare parcel of land where she grows beans and potatoes to sell wholesale. Delicious, organic vegetables are in high demand. She also has two cows and 15 sheep on the farm. In order to further develop her farm, Zhanyl has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to buy potato seeds to plant and harvest. Zhanyl plans to use the income she earns from this investment to further grow her business, and she also plans to renovate her home.

loans.use: to buy seeds in order to grow organic potatoes.

loans.name: Fredy

texts.es:
Un almacén de tienda de repuestos de motocicleta y artículos varios son es lo que mantiene viva la ilusión de Fredy, ya que su sueño es salir adelante, mejorar su situación económica y sostener a su familia, pues considera que lo mas importante en la vida es el trabajo duro y la perseverancia.
Trabaja incansablemente todos durante 12 horas para generar su propio sustento. 

El nunca pensó en que podía crecer y ahora que interactuar le da la oportunidad de prestarle dinero, quiere aprovechar para realizar la compra de repuestos de motocicleta en general, ayudándole a conseguir más clientes para que se antojen de los artículos que tiene para ellos y sus vehículos.
texts.en:
A store selling motorcycle parts and various items are what keeps Fredy's dream alive. His dream is to make progress, improve his financial situation and maintain his family as he believes that hard work and perseverance are the most important things. He works tirelessly for 12 hours to generate his own income.

Fredy never believed he would be able to expand his business, but now that Interactuar have given him the opportunity to lend him money he wants to take advantage of it to buy spare parts for motorcycles. This will help him to gain more customers as the items he has for them and their vehicles will attract customers.

loans.use: to buy spare parts to help him to gain more customers

loans.name: Armando Bercelio

texts.es:
Comercialización de ñame es la actividad a la que se dedica el señor Armando, un hombre con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y superarse.

Sale todos los días en su bicicleta para vender sus productos y así obtener los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su familia.

Solicita un apoyo económico para la compra de surtido de ñame y así poder abastecerse y mejorar su capital de trabajo e inventarios.
texts.en:
Armando sells yams. He is a man with all his whits in place in order to face the world and succeed. 

He goes out every day on his bike and sells his products. This is how he makes the necessary income to take care of his family. 

He is requesting a loan in order to buy a large quantity of yams and in this way support himself and improve his working capital and inventory.

loans.use: to buy a large quantity of yams and in this way support himself and improve his working capital and inventory.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.fr:
Jacqueline est une femme dynamique et débrouillarde de 37 ans. Elle vit avec son mari et leurs quatre enfants dans leur propre maison, maison construite par leurs propres efforts. Ses enfants sont tous scolarisés et ils sont âgés entre 6 à 16 ans. Le mari travail en tant que chauffeur dans une grande Institution de Formation de la capitale et perçoit un salaire mensuel.
Quant à Jacqueline, elle exerce une activité de vente en détail de sous-vêtements (slips et chaussettes) et des pochettes et portefeuilles depuis 2011. Signalons quand même qu'elle était déjà dans le commerce long temps avant cette année. Elle vendait déjà beaucoup d'autres articles.
Sa priorité en ce moment est de développer son activité, c'est à dire d'y investir davantage, augmenter le fonds à utiliser pour pouvoir renouveler et diversifier les marchandises. Elle projette même d'ouvrir une boutique un jour.
texts.en:
Jacqueline, aged 37, is an energetic and resourceful woman. She lives with her husband and their four children in their own house, built through their own efforts. Her children are all in school, and they are 6 to 16 years old. The husband works as a driver at a large training institution in the capital and receives a monthly salary. As for Jacqueline herself, she has had a retail business selling undergarments (underwear and socks), clutch purses, and wallets since 2011. Still, we note that she has been in commerce for a long time before this year. She has already sold many other goods. 

Her priority at this time is to develop her business, that is, to invest more in it, increase her [working capital] to renew her merchandise and diversify it. She even plans to open a shop, one day.

loans.use: to purchase clutch purses, wallets, socks, and undergarments

loans.name: Aurora

texts.en:
Aurora is from GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is single and assist her family financially. She is one of the beneficiaries of the employment program of CCT Covenant Community Service Cooperative.* She has been employed in a garment factory in Cavite for two years.

She works as a finishing line leader in a garment factory in Cavite. She is in charge of technical garment accessories. Her job includes following up accessories from suppliers and distribute them to the sewers. One of the main concerns of factory employees in the Philippines is how to make ends meet. As minimum wage earner and with the increasing cost of living, Aurora's income is not adequate to provide for their household needs. Sadly these low-income employees do not have access to banks and or other financial institution so Aurora resort to borrowing from money lenders who charge very high interest rates and require her to surrender her ATM (her salary is credited to her ATM acct.) as loan collateral.

Aurora is kindly asking your financial assistance to prevent her from being enslaved to loan sharks. Your help will enable her to recover her ATM and pay for the utilities of their house. She has also previously accessed loans through CCT Credit Cooperative and she had no problem in repaying them since the loan payment is deducted every pay day. Aurora aims to be the best in her line of work and hopes for promotion and higher salary.

She meets up with his co-fellowship** members to share stories of her work. **CCT staff and volunteers conduct weekly fellowship meetings for the factory workers before their work routine to do Bible readings, prayer and discipleship sessions to encourage and inspire them to do their best in life and be the kind of person God wants them to be. 

* The Covenant Community Service Cooperative works to provide local communities with a labor force trained and equipped with the skills required for deployment in construction and site development projects. The cooperative prepares its members to acquire these skills, quality for jobs, cultivate savings consciousness, and provide decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs are the following: Professional Staff Services Program, Workers Guild Development Program, Enterprise Development Program, and Consultancy Services.

loans.use: To recover her ATM and pay for her house utilities.

loans.name: Iris Rosanna

texts.es:
Iris tiene 40 años de edad, es soltera, tiene 01 hija, vive en casa familiar en una zona rural ubicada en el distrito de Nueva Arica, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. Los pobladores de este distrito se dedican al comercio y crianza de animales principalmente.

Ella se dedica a brindar servicios de educación, da clases a los niños de su distrito que requieran sus servicios, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 02 años por lo que cuenta con experiencia en este negocio y con clientes fijos quienes dan muy buenas referencias personales y laborales de ella. Solicita préstamo para la compra de una computadora de escritorio y además materiales como cuadernos, sillas y mesas para la implementacion de su local en donde brinda sus servicios como profesora, con esto ella espera mejorar el servicio de enseñanza que brinda a sus alumnos lo que le ganerará ingresos mayores y le va a permitir mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Iris is 40 years old, is single, and has one daughter. She lives with her family in a rural area located in the district of Nueva Arica in the Chiclayo province and Lambayeque region on the north coast of Peru. The residents of this district primarily make a living in commerce and by raising animals.

Iris makes a living by providing educational services; she gives classes to the children in her district who require her services. She has had this business for two years so she has experience and established customers who give her very good personal and work references. 

She is asking for the loan to buy an office computer and other materials like notebooks, chairs and tables to set up the space where she provides her services as a teacher. With this she hopes to improve the teaching service she offers to her students, which will enable her to have better earnings and allow her and her family to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy an office computer and other materials like notebooks, chairs and tables to set up the space where she provides her services as a teacher.

loans.name: Feliz

texts.es:
Felix se ha dedicado a la carpintería gran parte de su vida, pues desde muy temprana edad inició trabajando como empleado en algunas carpinterías y ebanisterías donde aprendió a realizar la actividad. 

Felix al ver que su negocio estaba muy mal remunerado decidió independizarse y montar su propio taller de carpintería donde gracias a la buena calidad de sus trabajos ha podido tener una gran cantidad de clientes. 
Trabaja con solo durante 12 horas todos los días.

Felix se encuentra casado y es padre de 1 hija, a quien siempre le ha querido ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades de progreso. 

Debido a que tiene dificultades de capital, Felix ha tenido que rechazar algunos pedidos de sus clientes por la poca capacidad para conseguir las materias primas necesarias. 

Con el ánimo de mejorar esta condición, aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de materias primas como madera, pegante, clavos, entre otros, para la fabricación de grandes pedidos de sus clientes. 

Felix aspira que el préstamo le permita elaborar estos pedidos sin que se afecten sus ingresos mensuales. Además, espera que el negocio le genere ingresos con los cuales pueda ofrecerles a su esposa y su hija una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades de salir adelante.
texts.en:
Felix has been a carpenter for most of his life. He started working as a clerk in a carpentry and cabinet making shop at a very young age where he learned his trade. 

Seeing that the business was poorly paid he decided to open up his own carpentry shop where thanks to the good quality of his work he has been able to maintain a large number of clients. He works every day alone for 12 hours a day. 

He is married and the father of one daughter to whom he has always wanted to offer a better quality of life and better opportunities. 

Due to the fact that he has difficulties with capital, he has had to reject some requests from his clients due to the inability to find the necessary raw materials. 

With the hope of improving this situation, he is requesting a  loan which will give him the possibility to buy raw materials such as wood, glue, nails etc. This will allow him to handle the larger requests from his clients.  

Felix hopes that the loan will allow him to take on these types of requests without them affecting his monthly income.

He also hopes that the business will generate enough income so that he can give his wife and daughter a better quality of life and better opportunities to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as wood, glue, nails etc. to use for large requests from his clients.

loans.name: Félix

texts.fr:
Félix est un père de famille très consciencieux et responsable de 38 ans. Il vit avec sa femme et ses trois enfants dans une maison encore en location. Les enfants sont tous scolarisés dans une école catholique. Son épouse est couturière. Il est très fier de sa petite famille et travaille dur pour lui offrir le meilleur.
Félix exerce une activité de vente en détail des chaussures à l'occasion. Il est dans cette affaire depuis 2012. Avant il vendait des friperies.
Son objectif est de de devenir grossiste, donc pour pouvoir y parvenir, il voudrait y investir beaucoup plus pour augmenter les stocks de marchandises. Ce qui explique sa demande de crédit.
En plus , son rêve est de pouvoir construire sa propre maison un jour.
texts.en: Félix, aged 38, is a very conscientious father and head of household. He lies with his wife and his three children in a house they still rent. The children are provided with schooling in a Catholic school. His wife is a seamstress. Félix is very proud of his little family and works hard to provide the best. He has a retail business selling used shoes. He has been in this business since 2012. In the past, he used to sell secondhand clothing. His goal is to become a wholesale merchant. So, to achieve this, he would like to invest in his business much more in order to increase his stock of merchandise. This explains his loan request. Also, his dream is be able to build a house of his own one day.

loans.use: to purchase 3 bales of used shoes

loans.name: Jesus Mi Salvador Group

texts.es: El grupo “JESUS MI SALVADOR ” está conformado por socios ansioso por mejorar la calidad de vida de sus familias. Marleny  tiene 23 años de edad es conviviente. Ella se dedica a la confección de prendas de vestir  hace tres años. y a la vez se dedica a la venta de ropa. El crédito los invertirá en la compra de telas hilos. El grupo agradece a los inversionistas KIVA por el crédito brindado. Marleny es la primera persona parada del lado derecho.
texts.en:
The Jesus Mi Salvador group is made up of members who are highly motivated to improve the quality of life of their families.

Marleny is 23 years old and in a common-law relationship. She has worked for three years making clothes, and additionally she sells clothes. She will use this loan to buy fabrics and threads. 

The group is grateful to Kiva members for the loan. In the photo, Maria is the first person standing from the right.

loans.use: to buy more fabrics and threads.

loans.name: Lyndiane Boulevard Group

texts.fr: Ce banc villageois a été inauguré le 13 Juin 2008. Ce groupe est constitué de reize femmes qui ont les mêmes objectifs de réussite. madame Astou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée, âgée de 42 ans et mère de six enfants dont trois filles. Elle s'active dans la vente de sandwich depuis plus de quatre ans. Elle va acheter avec le prêt sollicité 10 kg de viande, 50 kg d'oignons et huit litres d'huile. La qualité de son produit lui permet de fidéliser sa clientèle. Les bénéfices vont servir à participer à la prise en charge des frais de nourriture de la famille.
texts.en: This 'banc villageois' was inaugurated on June 13, 2008. This group is composed of 13 women who have the same goals. Ms. Astou, who is at the right in the photo with a hand raised, is the group's representative. She is married, 42 years old, and the mother of six children, including three girls. She has been active selling sandwiches for over four years. She is going to use this loan to purchase 10 kg of meat, 50 kg of onions, and 8 liters of oil. The quality of her food allows her to win the loyalty of her customers. The profits will be used to help cover the costs of food for the family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making sandwiches

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Cụm 24 Thôn Tân Xã Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Lan is applying for a loan to purchase fish to sell. She has a retail business selling fish. Lan is 37 years old and she is married with three children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 cụm 24 thôn Tân Xã Quảng Nham Solidarity Group, which consists of 4 members. She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Lan joined Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. She has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa microfinance institution. Lan has been involved in this business for six years. The main hardship that Lan faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profits, Lan hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Lyndiane Boulevard Group

texts.fr: Ce banc villageois est ouvert le 13 Juin 2008. Madame Roya qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est la représentante du groupe. Elle est mariée. Elle est âgée de 44 ans et mère de neuf enfants dont cinq filles. Elle s'active dans la teinture et le batick depuis plus de cinq ans. Elle va acheter avec le crédit sollicité cinq pots d'intrant pour la confection de draps de qualité. les bénéfices vont servir à participer à la prise en charge des frais de nourriture de la famille.
texts.en: This 'banc villageois' was opened on June 13, 2008. Ms. Roya, who is at the right in the photo with a hand raised, is the group’s representative. She is married, 44 years old, and the mother of nine children, including five girls. She has been active in dyeing fabrics and batik for over five years. She is going to use the loan requested to purchase five containers of ingredients for making quality bed sheets. The profits will be used to help cover the cost of food for the family.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for dyeing fabrics and batik

loans.name: Nidia Rosa

texts.es:
Nidia es una determinante, imparable y simpática mujer, que sin importar las adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, tanto económicas, familiares como laboralmente, inicio con un negocio de restaurante que opera en su hogar, allí elabora los productos, aplicando sus recetas. 

Tiene diferentes inconvenientes, básicamente con sus distribuidores por la difícil crisis que atraviesa su barrio con los productores de leche, materia prima de su producto; pero superando estas crisis, Nidia logro montar su negocio. 

Su negocio está prosperando y quiere poder ofrecer un empleo a las madres cabeza de hogar, por esto solicita un crédito para la compra de vajillas y para la reparación del piso y el techo de su cocina. 

De este modo podrá crecer con un negocio fuerte y estable que compite con los demás restaurantes de la zona.
texts.en:
Nidia is a determined, relentless and friendly woman who has always been able to handle the adversities life has given her no matter economic, familial or work related. 

She opened a restaurant that she operates out of her home. Here she creates her dishes using her recipes. 

She has had several drawbacks, mainly with her distributors due to the difficult crisis facing her neighborhood milk producers, a raw material in her dishes. But overcoming this crisis, Nidia was able to set up her business. 

Her business is prospering and she wants to be able to offer help to the head of household mothers. 

She is requesting a loan to buy crockery and to repair the floor and ceiling in her kitchen. 

This way she can grow her business and establish that she is a competitor with the other restaurants in the area.

loans.use: to buy crockery and to repair the floor and ceiling in her kitchen.

loans.name: Umedjon Group

texts.ru:
Эта группа Умедчон. Членами группы являются Умедчон и Дилафруз. Дилафруз 42 года. Она с поддержкой мужа вырастила пятерых прекрасных детей, в том числе и Умедчона. Кроме Умедчона у Дилафруз есть еще сын и три дочери. Умедчону 23 года. Он пока не женат, но хочет обзавестись семьей и стать примером для своих детей, как его отец для него. 
  Мать и сын, то есть Дилафруз и Умедчон вместе продвигают семейный бизнес. Они занимаются сельскохозяйственной деятельностью, культивируют саженцы. Этот бизнес им по душе, потому что они с пользой и интересом проводят время, работая на земле. 
   Дилафруз и Умедчон решили обратиться за кредитом, потому что МДО "ХУМО" имеет продукт, поддерживающий семейный бизнес. Так как сейчас самое время посадить саженцев, чтоб из них выросло плодотворное дерево. Они хотят воспользоваться моментом и расширить деятельность. Им сейчас в процессе работы не хватает минеральных удобрений. Из-за нехватки денежных средств, чтобы купить минеральных удобрений. Они приняли решение обратиться за кредитом.
texts.en: This is the Umedjon group. The members of the group are Umedjon and Dilafruz. Dilafruz is 42 years old. She and her husband have raised five wonderful children, one of whom is Umedjon. Dilafruz also has another son and three daughters. Umedjon is 23 years old. He is not yet married, but he hopes to have a family someday and set a good example for his children, like his father is for him. Umedjon and Dilafruz run the family business together. They run the farming operations and cultivate saplings. The work agrees with them, because they spend their time well and happily, working on the land. Dilafruz and Umedjon have applied for a loan because MLO Humo has a product which can support the family business. Since now is the right time to plant saplings so that they will grow into fruit-bearing trees, they want to use this opportunity to expand their operations. At this point in the process they do not have enough fertilizer and do not currently have the funds to buy more, so they have applied for a loan.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and cultivate seedlings.

loans.name: Nida

texts.en:
Nida is grateful that she was granted a 30,000 PHP loan which she used to buy gardening materials and supplies needed in her ornamental business. Through her earnings she is able to support her family and meet their daily basic needs. 

She would now like to apply for another PHP 20,000 loan which she will use to buy fertilizer and farm inputs (seedlings), pots, wires and net she needs for her growing her ornaments to sell. It will definitely help cover her family’s daily needs. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial assistance that will be given to her. 

Nida aims to grow her ornamental farm and attract more clients. She hopes to improve their house and buy a vehicle to transport her plants to her customers. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies. 

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to buy gardening materials like wire and baskets, and supplies such as seed and fertilizer, for her business

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer and her family live in Liloy. She earns a living through fish vending. Jennifer and her husband plan to renovate their house and applied an loan to buy building materials, paints, and to pay her workers. 

Jennifer wants her children to get a good education and establish successful careers in the future.

loans.use: to buy building materials, paints, and to pay her workers

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is 59 years old and married with six children. Virginia works very hard to provide for them.

Virginia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like spices, canned goods, home care products, school supplies, and other groceries.

Virginia has been in this business for 2 years. 

In the future, Virginia would like to build on and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like spices, canned goods, home care products, school supplies, and other groceries

loans.name: Nayith Sofia

texts.es:
Nayith es propietaria de un restaurante, tiene de 37 años de edad, vive con su esposo y 5 hijos menores de edad que dependen únicamente de este negocio para poder sobrevivir, comer, pagar sus deudas etc. 

Su negocio viene operando desde finales de Marzo de este año y ahora quiere solicitar un crédito para la compra insumos como carne, pollo, queso, arroz, aceite, verduras, entre otros ingredientes para la preparación de sus alimentos.

Este crédito le permitirá continuar con la venta de comidas y seguir manteniéndose en el mercado, pues es quien genera los mayores ingresos en su hogar. 

Su sueño es poder pagar la educación de sus hijos y comprarse una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Nayith is the owner of a restaurant.  She is 37 years old and lives with her husband and five under-age children who depend solely on this business to survive, eat, pay their bills, etc. She has been operating her business since the end of March of this year and now wants to ask for a loan so she can buy supplies such as meat, chicken, cheese, rice, oil, and vegetables among other ingredients, for the preparation of food for the restaurant. 

This loan will allow her to continue selling meals and remain in the market as she is the one who generates the most income in their household. Her dream is to be able to pay for her children's education and to buy her own home.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as meat, chicken, cheese, rice, oil, vegetables and other ingredients to prepare her food.

loans.name: Adolfo Segundo

texts.es:
Un pequeño puesto de venta de jugos fue lo que con mucho esfuerzo logro este emprendedor hombre de 30 años de edad llamado Adolfo, que buscando una alternativa para generar ingresos tuvo la idea de montar su negocio. 

Hoy en día por la inseguridad y violencia que se presenta en el sector, su negocio está viéndose afectado, pues están alejando sus clientes en estos tiempos de crisis. 

Solicita una ayuda crediticia con la Corporación Interactuar para tener capital de trabajo para invertirlo sabiamente en esta época difícil, comprando sillas, mesas, una carpa y una licuadora para intentar recuperar a sus clientes.

Espera lograr superar esta crisis y gozar en un futuro al lado de su esposa y su hija de 3 años.
texts.en: A small juice stand was what this thirty-year-old man named Adolfo was able to get off the ground with a lot of effort; seeking an alternative to generate earnings he had the idea to start this business. His business is being affected by the insecurity and violence in the area today, as his customers are disappearing in these times of crisis. He is asking for a loan from Corporación Interactuar to have working capital to invest wisely at this difficult time, buying chairs, tables, a tarp and a blender to try to get his customers back. He hopes to overcome this crisis and enjoy the future at the side of his wife and their three-year-old daughter.

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables, a tarp and a blender to try to get his customers back.

loans.name: Kandion's Group

texts.fr:
Créé le 12 Aout 2009 à l’inauguration du dit banc villageois, ce groupe est composé de femmes qui ont une expérience dans le programme des bancs villageois. Elles sont toutes issues du même village et partageant des liens forts de solidarité et d’entre aide. Elles ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Kandion (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée), est l’emprunteuse vedette du groupe. Elle est mariée âgée de 48 ans et mère de 07 enfants dont 04 garçons et 03 filles. Elle s'active dans la vente de patte d'arachide

Avec son nouveau crédit, elle compte acheter 10 sacs d'arachide d'une valeur de 100 000f et après transformation elle le revend par sceau à 12 000f.

Avec les bénéfices, elle compte assurer la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et s'occuper de ses enfants
texts.en:
Created on August 12, 2009 at the inauguration of the 'banc villageois’, this group is composed of women who have experience in the 'banc villageois'’program. They are all from the same village and share strong ties of solidarity and mutual-assistance. Their main work involves small-scale commerce.

Ms. Kandion (sitting at the far right with a hand raised) is the featured borrower of the group. She is married, 48 years old, and the mother of seven children (4 boys and 3 girls). She is active in selling peanut butter. 

With this new loan, she plans on purchasing 10 sacks of peanuts worth 100,000 francs and then process them for resale by the pail at 12,000 francs each.

loans.use: to purchase peanuts to process and resell by the pail

loans.name: Nrrajuama Group

texts.es:
El grupo “Nrrajuama” está integrado por mujeres trabajadoras y con iniciativa; actualmente solicitan el crédito a VisionFund México para mejorar sus negocios. El nombre del grupo proviene de un vocablo en mazhua, su lengua materna, que significa "lugar donde están".
   Doña Patricia es una persona dedicada y que siempre muestra una actitud positiva. En su comunidad, de cariño le llaman Paty. Su familia está compuesta por Antonio, su esposo, y cinco hijos de los cuales cuatro continúan sus estudios académicos. Desde hace 23 años la pareja se ha dedicado a la compra y venta de productos para el hogar, específicamente paños para cocina y toallas para baño. Paty menciona que comenzaron la actividad por falta de un empleo fijo. Actualmente el negocio funciona bien, gracias al esfuerzo y a que siempre tratan de comprar la mercancía por mayoreo para conseguir un mejor precio. Es por eso que el préstamo de VisionFund les resulta de gran ayuda para continuar con la activdad, esta vez le facilitará comprar más paños para cocina. 
  Los puntos de venta de Paty y su esposo son la Ciudad de México o Toluca, ciudades que se ubican a 3 horas de su comunidad, aproximadamente. Ellos prefieren vender en estos lugares porque es donde pueden vender con mayor facilidad toda su mercancía que si la ofrecieran en comunidades aledañas a donde viven. 
   No obstante, en estas ciudades tampoco cuentan con un lugar estable o local donde mostrar los paños y las toallas, ellos venden a pie recorriendo las calles de la zona, y cuando llega a sobrar mercancía la encargan con algún conocido para evitar pagar el transporte de regreso.
   "De verdad estoy muy agradecida con el apoyo de VisionFund porque pude ampliar mi negocio y construir la casa que antes no tenía" comentó Doña Paty. La meta que tiene ahora es hacer crecer su negocio para poder mejorar su calidad de vida y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios.
   Las demás integrantes del grupo son: Ma. del Carmen quien invertirá en antojitos tipicos; Adelaida, en artículos de papelería; Ma. Alberta, en su tienda de abarrotes; Bernarda, en vasos de licuadora; Angélica, en jarciaría y María Maximina en bisutería.

*En la imagen, Paty viste un suéter color rosa. La foto fue tomada en la plazoleta junto a los arcos, ubicada en el municipio de las integrantes. Se pueden apreciar la iglesia y el quiosco.
texts.en:
The group “Nrrajuama” is made up of hard working women with initiative.  Presently they are seeking a loan from VisionFund Mexico to improve their businesses.  The group's name is in Mazhua, their native language, and means, "the place where they are".  

Dona Patricia is a dedicated person with a positive attitude.  In her community, her friends call her Paty.  Her family consists of Antonio, her husband, and five children of whom four are still studying.  

For 23 years she and her husband have worked in the purchase and sale of home goods.  Specifically they have sold kitchen cloths and bath towels.  Paty mentioned that they began this job due to lack of steady employment.  Now the business runs well, thanks to their effort and to the fact that they purchase their goods wholesale to get a better price.  For this reason the loan from VisionFund was a great aid to continue this job.  This time it will help to buy more kitchen towels.  

Paty and her husband sell in Toluca or Mexico City, both of which are located three hours from their community.  They prefer to sell in those places because it is easier to sell in the cities than in their smaller community.  However, in these cities they cannot count on a consistent location where they can display their goods.  They sell on foot, covering the street of the zone.  When they have too much merchandise, they have a friend take it over in order to avoid the cost of transporting it home.  

"Truly I am very thankful for the support of VisionFund because I was able to increase my business and construct the house that we never had", commented Dona Paty.  Her goal now is to increase her business to be able to better her quality of life and continue supporting her children in their studies.  

The other members of the group are:  Maria del Carmen, who will invest in typical snacks, Adelaida, who will buy paper goods, Maria Alberta, who will invest in her grocery store, Bernarda, who will purchase blender cups, Angelica, who will purchase household goods,   and Maria Maximina who will buy costume jewelry.  In the photo, Paty is wearing a pink sweater.  The photo was taken in the plaza by the arches, located in their town.  The church and gazebo can be seen.

loans.use: to purchase kitchen towels.

location.town: San Agustin Mextepec, San Felipe del progreso

loans.name: Melanie

texts.en:
Melanie, 26 years old, is from Las Piñas City, Metro Manila. Due to job scarcity in Metro Manila, she dared to work in a garment factory in the province of Cavite, where the minimum wage is much lower than in Metro Manila but the cost of living is almost the same. She has been working there for eight long years that prove her patience and dedication to work. As a Controller, she is responsible for inspecting the quality of products as well as supervising some levels of the workforce. She also does the delicate task of keeping records on products and items. 

Melanie is still single, but her responsibilities in her family cannot be discounted. In the Philippines, where families are known to be so closely knit, single persons are expected to help with their family’s expenses, including those for basic needs such as food, utilities, siblings’ education, parents' medicines, and incidentals like transportation to the province. Most of the time, low-income earners like Melanie can barely make both ends meet, and they have no access to banks and other financial institutions. This is the reason they are usually victimized by usurious money-lenders who charge them with very high interest rates and capture their automated teller machine (ATM) cards as loan collateral. Melanie is thankful that she now has other options, because she is a member of CCT Covenant Community Service Cooperative*. She is very much looking forward to your help so she can provide the transportation expenses of her parents to their home province in the Visayas-Mindanao region. This home visit is very important to her aging parents, but it will require them to travel by air or sea, which is quite expensive. 

As a responsible and loving daughter, Melanie wants to make her family happy at all times, uplift them from poverty, own a decent house, and start a small business in the future. She meets up with her co-fellowship** members to share stories of her work. *The Covenant Community Service Cooperative works to provide local communities with a labor force trained and equipped with the skills required for employment. The cooperative prepares its members to acquire these skills, qualify for jobs, cultivate savings consciousness, and provide decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs are the following: Professional Staff Services Program, Workers Guild Development Program, Enterprise Development Program, and Consultancy Services. **CCT staff and volunteers regularly conduct fellowship meetings for the factory workers before they start their daily work routines. Bible readings, prayer devotions, and spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre- and post-working hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: to provide the transportation expenses of her parents to their home province in the Visayas-Mindanao region

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Minimum wage earners like factory workers in the Philippines always struggle to make ends meet. That is especially true when the work location is in the province where the minimum wage is much lower than in Metro Manila, but in fact the cost of living is almost the same.

This is the exact dilemma of Romeo who has worked as a Sampling Sewer in a garment factory in GMA, Cavite for six years now. He and his wife, Florentina, who is also a sewer,  both work hard to provide all the needs of their four children. As a Sampling Sewer, Romeo prepares the sample clothing that serves as a basis for other sewers to reproduce. It’s a delicate job that requires creativity and initiative. 

Fortunately, Romeo is aptly fitted for it. Romeo is also a beneficiary of CCT Covenant Community Service Cooperative,* an organization that helps guide Romeo and other members to acquire necessary skills for the job and strengthen their spiritual and devotional life.  

Romeo and his wife are both hardworking but there would always come a time when big financial needs arise. This time, Romeo is in that situation. He needs to pay the graduation fee of their child and he humbly seeks your help. He is sincerely praying that you could be part of their child’s first step to success.

Romeo further dreams to run a successful business in the near future and he meets up with his co-fellowship** members to share stories of his life and work. *The Covenant Community Service Cooperative works to provide local communities with a labor force trained and equipped with the skills required for employment. 

The cooperative prepares its members to acquire these skills, qualify for jobs, cultivate savings consciousness, and provide decent shelter, food, and education for their families. Its core programs are the following: Professional Staff Services Program, Workers Guild Development Program, Enterprise Development Program, and Consultancy Services. 

**CCT staff and volunteers regularly conduct fellowship meetings for the factory workers before they start their daily work routines. Bible readings, prayer devotions, and spiritual mentoring and discipleship sessions take place during pre- and post-working hours and breaks, powering up the lives of both volunteer leaders and line workers.

loans.use: to pay his child's graduation fee

loans.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
NASREEN is a 44-year-old lady; her residence is in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. 

She is the mother of three children; her son owns a wooden material shop in which he sells raw material for making furniture such as chairs, table, almira and beds. His practice to buy planks and timber from market; he cuts the raw wooden into multiple sizes for selling. 

His wooden cutting machine has become out-of-order due to continuously usage for a long time. The demand for goods has suddenly increased, and her son has spent all the money to buy raw materials. Now he does not have enough cash in hand to fix the wood cutting machine. 

Therefore, NASREEN has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so her son would be able to buy a wood cutting machine. 

NASREEN is very thankful to the Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan for this honorable support. 

Note: NASREEN indicates herself by raising her hand in the given picture.

loans.use: to buy a wood cutting machine for her son's wooden material shop.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es:
Mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda e incrementar su utilidad son los grandes sueños de Jose, que con su trabajo de mantenimiento de electrodomésticos intenta ganarse la vida día a día.

Trabaja todos los días durante 6 horas prestando su servicio, es por esto que solicita un préstamo, pues desea comprar surtido de repuestos para sus electrodomésticos.

Este crédito le permitirá continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en: Improving the conditions of his home and increasing his utility are Jose's great dreams. Jose tries to earn a living each day with his work maintaining household electronics. He works every day for 6 hours, providing his service. This is why he is asking for a loan, since he wants to buy a variety of replacement parts for household electronics. This loan will enable him to continue with his work.

loans.use: to buy a variety of replacement parts for household electronics.

loans.name: Nidia Maria

texts.es:
Nidia, de 27 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de comidas en su casa ubicada en el municipio de Medellin, en este negocio vende almuerzos y desayunos.

Nidia trabaja todos los días, es una mujer muy responsable, juiciosa y aplicada con su negocio.

Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un negocio sostenible. 

Ella pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar insumos como pollo, aceite, harina, entre otros.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño y tendrá una mayor variedad de alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio dependen sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Nidia, 27, has decided to open up a food business in her house located in the municipality of Medellin. She sells lunches and breakfasts. 

Nidia works every day. She is a responsible, sensible and dedicated to her business 

One of her biggest dreams is to have a sustainable business. 

She is requesting a loan to capitalize on her business and buy ingredients such as chicken, oil, flour etc. 

The loan will impact her life and her business in a very positive way. She will be able to fulfill her dream and will have a bigger variety of food to offer her clients. 

Also, her two children depend on this business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as chicken, oil, flour etc.

loans.name: Yovany Eslit

texts.en: Yovany is a young father who works hard to give his wife and two children a better life. Their current home is made of perishable materials, and during the hot months in Tabasco, it is almost unbearable to be inside. Yovany works every day at construction sites earning close to USD 600. His wife helps as much as possible with occasional jobs. This has allowed them to save some money to finish their home, but they still need a loan so they can get all the materials they need. With your help, they can start working on replacing the materials and finish their house right away. Given the fact that they have no way of proving an income, no other financial institution will give them credit. With this loan, they will also receive technical supervision to make sure that the construction meets all the safety and quality standards.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish building his home

loans.name: Viviana Maria

texts.es:
Gracias a la perseverancia y coraje de Viviana es que su hogar puede tener una vida digna.

Ella prepara y vende comidas rápidas en el municipio de Medellín, actividad que emprendió con el afán de buscar nuevos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia.

Su hijo es la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar diariamente y esforzarse para ser cada día mejor.
Trabaja sola durante 5 horas todos los días.

Ella espera poder impulsar su negocio con la compra insumos y materia prima, este impulso se lo pueden dar la Corporación Interactuar y los prestamistas de Kiva.

Con estos elementos ella podrá tener sus alimentos disponibles para sus clientes en todo momento.

Su mayor sueño es poder pagar la educación de sus hijos y poder tener un negocio estable.
texts.en:
Thanks to the perseverance and courage of Viviana, her family can have a dignified life. She prepares and sells fast foods at the municipality of Medellin. 

She started this business because she wanted to find a new way to support her family. 

Her son is her biggest motivation to work every day and to try to be better every day. She works by herself for 5 hours every day. 

She hopes to be able to boost her business by purchasing supplies and raw materials. Corporaction Interctuar and the Kiva lenders can help her give this boost. 

With this she will be able to have food available for her clients at any moment. 

Her biggest dream is to pay for her children's education and have a stable business.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare fast foods.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase sand, quarry stone, cement, iron, and a toilet to make a drain and install a toilet at the back of her house for improved hygiene

loans.name: Vera

texts.ru: Вера, 34 года, не замужем, есть сын. Образование-среднее, занимается полеводством и животноводством. Благодаря упорному труду и терпеливому характеру Веры, на сегодняшний день она имеет хорошее хозяйство: 3 коровы, продает экологически-чистое молоко. На 2,0 Га земли растет фасоль и клевер. Сама коптит и продает окорочка. Ежемесячная прибыль Веры составляет 17,000 сом (KGS). Этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь Веры и ее сына. Так как животноводство - это главный вид деятельности, Вера решила его развивать и обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку семян и вспашку земли для выращивания органических продуктов. Доходы от кредита Вера планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение количества скота, что позволит ей воспитывать и растить сына.
texts.en: Vera is 34 years old, unmarried, with one son. She has a high school education and works in farming and animal husbandry. Thanks to her hard work and patient character Vera now has a solid farm. She has three cows which produce organic milk, and a 2 hectare plot where she grows beans and clover. She also cures and sells chicken legs. Vera's monthly income is 17,000 KGS, which is not enough to sustain her and her son. Since raising livestock is her main business, Vera has decided to develop it further. She applied for a loan of 50,000 KGS at Bai Tushum Bank to purchase seeds and till the land so she can grow organic produce. Vera plans to invest the income she earns in purchasing more livestock, which will allow her to feed and take care of her son.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and to cultivate her land to grow organic produce.

loans.name: Ismenia Paola

texts.es:
Ismenia, en su mente lo único que tiene presente es que para salir adelante hay que trabajar duramente y mantenerse siempre fuerte ante las adversidades que se puedan presentar.
Por esta razón, todos los días labora de una manera firme pero sin dejar a un lado su gran sonrisa y carisma que le han permitido ganarse un lugar desde hace 3 años cuando decidió iniciar con su venta de mercancía.

En su negocio ofrece bolsos de diferentes referencias los cuales son muy bonitos y bien elaborados.

Pide un apoyo económico para la compra surtido de bolsos para mejorar su inventario.

Ella sabe que de la mano de interactuar y con el apoyo de los prestamistas de KIVA podrá tener un negocio muy bien acreditado y con la mejor estabilidad posible.
texts.en: The only thing on Ismenia’s mind is that to get ahead, you have to work very hard and always remain strong through the adversity that may arise.  For this reason, she works very hard every day, never forgetting to show her smile and charisma, which has allowed her to earn herself a place where she started selling merchandise three years ago.  In her business, she offers pretty, well-made bags of different varieties.  She is requesting financial support to increase her inventory.  She knows that in the hands of “Interactuar”, and with the support of the Kiva loans, she will be able to have a very well-accredited business and the best possible stability.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of bags.

loans.name: Matilde

texts.es:
La socia Matilde se sigue dedicando al negocio de agricultura, la socia es una mujer trabajadora que por medio de este trabajo la socia quiere salir adelante y sacar adelante su familia. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Matilde continues to work in the business of agriculture. She is a hardworking woman who, through her work, wants to get ahead and help her family. She is requesting a loan to buy seeds and fertilizers.

She is glad of the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers.

loans.name: Ivis Del Socorro

texts.es:
Al hablar de Ivis se puede evidenciar que es una mujer muy trabajadora y servicial que todo lo que hace es en bien de su familia y bienestar de la misma.

Ella vive en una humilde casa en el municipio de Sincelejo donde convive con sus hijos por los cuales ha luchado para darles una vida digna.

Ella se gana la vida con la compra y venta de plátano y tiene plena fe en su negocio.

Es una mujer trabajadora, constante y muy amante de su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de plátano y coco principalmente, adicional a esto requiere capitalizar su negocio para tener un amplio inventario disponible para vender a sus clientes al por mayor.

El tiene la esperanza de poder encontrar ayuda en las personas de corazón solidario y puede contar en pleno con el apoyo de la Corporación Interactuar.
texts.en:
It is evident when speaking of Ivis that she is a hardworking, helpful woman who does everything for the good of her family and their continued wellbeing.

She lives with her children in a humble home in the Sincelejo municipality. She has persevered to give them a life with dignity.

She earns a living buying and selling bananas, and has strong faith in her business. She puts in the effort at work, is tenacious, and she loves her family.

She's applying for a loan mainly to buy a range of bananas and coconuts. In addition she is looking to capitalize her business and have a large inventory available for bulk sales.

She is hoping to find help from the solidarity in the hearts of lenders here, and she can fully count on the support from Interactuar.

loans.use: to buy primarily a range of bananas and coconuts.

loans.name: Virgen De Natividad I Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD I”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Carlota ella es soltera y tiene 63 años y tiene 5 hijos; ; La socia trabaja en su negocio de crianza y venta de pollos,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de venta de chicha que es una bebida a base de maiz, la socia los pollos los hace engordar y crecer y luego los vende en las diferentes mercados, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender los pollos. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar pollos y alimentos para los pollos.

La socia que esta pegada a la foto grupal se les tomo la foto después de la reunión porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
 
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de salón de belleza, negocio de venta de ganaderia, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de animales.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD I” communal bank. This bank is located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco. 

The member Carlota is 63 years old and single, and she has 5 children. She works in her business raising and selling chickens. She also works in the business of selling 'chicha' (a corn-based drink). She raises and fattens the chickens and later sells them in different markets. She has worked in this business for several years, and it is going well for her. Her dream is to have a venue where she can sell the chickens. She is requesting a loan to buy chickens and food for the chickens.

The member whose picture is attached to the group photo had her picture taken after the meeting; she asked permission to do so for work reasons. The other members of the group have businesses working in a beauty salon, cattle sales, grocery store, and animal sales. Carlota is thankful to those who form a part of her dream through this loan, and promises to make the payments per the established repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy chickens and food for the chickens.

loans.name: Bahrullokhuja

texts.ru: Бахруллохуча жизнерадостный и трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 28 лет. Он женат и имеет 1-го ребенка. Он обратился в Арванд впервые, когда узнал, что есть возможность получить финансовую поддержку. Сам Бахруллохуча живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он не имеет высшего образования, так как не было возможности учиться в Университете из-за финансовых трудностей в семье. Жена Бахруллохуча также не имеет образования и является домохозяйкой, она занимается домашними делами и воспитанием детей. Чтобы иметь доход на пропитание, Бахруллохуча занимается своим бизнесом. Он занимается откормом и продажей крупного рогатого скота. Также он занимается переработкой молока, полученного от этого скота. От данного бизнеса он получает хороший доход. Жена также помогает Бахруллохуча вести этот бизнес, она ухаживает за скотом и получает молоко. Сейчас Бахруллохуча хочет увеличить количество скота для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку скота. Бахруллохуча очень надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en: Bahrullokhuja is a cheerful and hardworking 28 year old. He is married and has one child. He first turned to MDO Arvand when he found out that he could receive financial support. Bahrullokhuja lives with his family in the countryside. He doesn't have any higher education, because he couldn't afford to go to university. Bahrullokhuja's wife is also not university educated and is a housewife - she takes care of the domestic duties and feeding the children. In order to earn a living, Bahrullokhuja runs his business. He fattens up and sells cattle and the milk he gets from them. He makes a good income from his business. His wife also helps on the farm, taking care of the cattle and milking them. Now Bahrullokhuja wishes to purchase more cattle and grow his business. Therefore he has applied for a loan from MDO Arvand.  Bahrullokhuja is hoping for favorable results and thanks Arvand in advance for their financial support.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Santos Anastacio

texts.es:
Santos, de 32 años de edad, estudio hasta tercer grado, está soltero y por ahora no tiene hijos y vive solo. 

Santos, tiene 3 años de estar a cargo de una ganadería, la cual maneja por que los dueños no viven en el país y de la misma manera cuida la casa, además se dedica a la siembra de maíz y sus cultivos están a 20 minutos de donde reside.  

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar una motocicleta, con el fin de hacer los mandados lo más pronto posible, pues cuando tiene que salir se tarda mucho y por esa razón descuida el trabajo y otra parte será para comprar insumos agrícolas, porque va sembrar 7,000 metros cuadrados de maíz. 

El sueño de Santos, es seguir trabajando y tener una casa propia, para que en un futuro cuando tenga familia, tenga donde resguardarlos.
texts.en:
Santos is 32 years old, studied until third grade, is single, lives alone, and doesn't have any children.  Santos has been in charge of a livestock farm for 3 years.  He manages the farm since the owners live out of the country.  He also takes care of the house and grows corn.  The crop fields are 20 minutes away from where he lives.  
He's requesting the loan to buy a motorcycle which will help expedite carrying out his errands.  When he has to leave the farm it takes him a long time which he could be using at work.  Another part will be for buying farming materials because he's about to plant 7,000 square meters of corn.  
Santos' dream is to continue working and have his own house so that he can take care of his future family.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Nhóm 06 Thôn Lý Tây Xã Thăng Bình Group

texts.en:
Sơn works in agriculture farming rice. She is requesting a loan to purchase supply for farming rice to sell. She is 58 years old and married with two children. 

Sơn is the group leader of the Nhóm 06 thôn Lý Tây xã Thăng Bình solidarity group, which consists of three members. 

In 2014, Sơn joined the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution to improve her business. Sơn has successfully repaid two loans from the Thanh Hoa microfinance institution.

Sơn has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Sơn faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Sơn hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well and for her children to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase supply for farming rice to sell.

loans.name: Raul Efrain

texts.es:
Raúl, de 55 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador, honesto y muy responsable, actualmente está soltero, pero anteriormente tuvo esposa y con ella procreó 4 hijos, de los cuales solo uno vive con él.

Raúl, trabaja como ordenanza en una escuela que está a 2 kilómetros de su casa, trabaja ahí desde hace 14 años y de los ingresos que gana, depende él, su hijo que está en su casa y también le ayuda a sus otros hijos, que están con su madre en otro lugar.

Raúl, necesita el crédito para construcción una galera para colocar un baño y colocar lavaderos, ya que actualmente está bajo sol y lluvia.

Sus sueños son, tener su casa bien adecuada y darles lo necesario a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Raúl is 55 years of age and is a hard working, honest, and very responsible man. He is currently single, but he previously had a wife and has 4 children with her. Only one of those children lives with him. 

Raúl works as an office assistant at a school that is 2 kilometers from his home. He has been working there for 14 years and with that income, he supports himself, his son that lives with him, and he also helps his other children who are with their mother in another place. 

Raúl needs the loan to build a shed to install a toilet and sinks, as they are currently under sun and rain. 

His dreams are to have a suitable home and to give his children everything necessary.

loans.use: to build a shed to install a toilet and sinks.

loans.name: Diana Patricia

texts.es:
Diana es una mujer pujante, servicial y trabajadora, a sus 30 años de edad, es casada y madre de 1 hija a la que ha sacado adelante con mucho esfuerzo y dedicación.

Desde hace 6 años se desempeña en el campo de la confección, prestando el servicio de confección a terceros y a clientes directos, el oficio lo aprendió a través de clases y trabaja con 3 empleados todos los días, así genera los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar.

Actualmente se motiva a solicitar el crédito para comprar una maquina ribeteadora, esto le permitirá aumentar su producción, logrando fidelizar a sus clientes actuales.

Diana manifiesta que desea continuar realizando su labor con mucho empeño, pues quiere ampliar su negocio y poder generar oportunidades de empleo, además de garantizar una estabilidad económica para dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Diana, 30, is a vibrant, friendly, hardworking woman.  She is married, and the mother of one child who she has gotten ahead through much effort and dedication.  Six years ago, she started working in the dressmaking field, a trade that she learned through classes.  She works with three employees every day, and thus generates sufficient income to help her husband with the responsibility of the household expenses.  

She is requesting this loan to purchase an overlock sewing machine, which will allow her to increase production, and obtain loyalty from her current customers.  Diana says that she wishes to continue putting a lot of effort into her job because she wants to generate job opportunities as well as ensure financial stability, and provide her family with a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase an overlock sewing machine, which will allow her to increase production, and obtain loyalty from her current customers.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.ru: Хабиба женщина 41 года. Она родилась и росла в рабочей семьи. После окончание школы, вышла замуж. У  Хабибы среднее образование. Она заботливая мать троих детей. Муж Хабибы, Баходир. Работает поваром. Но его заработная плата не хватает на содержание семьи и учебы детей. По этому Хабиба вместе с мужем решили дома заняться животноводством, что приносит им дополнительный доход. В месяц два раза муж  Хабибы покупает скот из рынка. Хабиба вместе с детьми откармливает их. И спустя два или три месяца снова  продает их. Часть полученную выручку они тратят на покупку корма для скота. А другую часть тратят на  содержание семьи. Дети Хабибы в свободное время помогают ей по хозяйству. А Хабиба большую часть свое свободное время тратит на ухаживанием скота. Поэтому посоветовавшись  с мужем Хабиба решила расширить свой объем поголовье скот. Но для приобретение скота у них появилась финансовый недостаток. Поэтому они решили обратится в МДО “Арванд” за кредитом. На полученный кредит они хотят расширит свой бизнес.  И таким образом заработать дополнительный доход, что хватит им для учебы детей и для содержание семьи.
texts.en: Habiba is 41 years old. She grew up in a working family. After graduating from school she got married. Habiba has a high school education. She is a caring and attentive mother to three children. Habiba's husband Bahodir is a cook. But his salary is not enough to support the family and send the children to school. Therefore, Habiba and her husband decided to raise livestock for additional income. Twice a month Habiba's husband buys cattle at the market.   Habiba and the children fatten them up, then, two or three months later, resell them. A portion of the proceeds goes towards feed and the rest helps support the family. Habiba's children help her on the farm in their free time. And most of Habiba's free time is spent taking care of the cattle. After talking with her husband, Habiba decided to increase her cattle stock. Since they do not currently have the funds to purchase more cattle, they decided to apply for a loan from MDO Arvand. With this loan they plan to expand their business, to supplement their income and thus support the family and their children's studies.

loans.use: to purchase more livestock

loans.name: Ruendy Benedicto

texts.es:
Ruendy, de 26 años de edad, es un muchacho visionario, en el año 2007 se graduó de la carrera técnico en logística y aduana y en el año 2010 decidió estudiar teología en un instituto bíblico, pero no logro culminar sus estudios porque los últimos 2 años tiene que estudiarlos en la capital del país y no tenía como financiarlo; fue así como decidió dedicarse al comercio de huevos, pero mientras trabajaba vendiendo huevos, aplico para una plaza en otra empresa y quedo laborando ahí y el negocio se lo cedió a su padrastro.- Hoy en día está casado y su esposa trabaja en una gasolinera a 3 kilómetros  de donde viven.

Ruendy, ahora trabaja como empleado en una ONG, que trabaja en conjunto con el Ministerio de Educación del país, específicamente está trabajando en un programa de alfabetización, en donde su función es graduar cierta cantidad de personas analfabetas cada mes, ya tiene 2 años trabajando ahí y se siente muy conforme.

El préstamo solicitado es para comprar muebles para su casa, pues actualmente están viviendo junto con su suegra y quieren independizarse, con mucho esfuerzo han logrado remodelar un cuarto que le regaló la mamá a Ruendy.

Ruendy, sueña con llegar a tener hijos y llevarlos algún día a pasear a los Estados Unidos y comprar otro vehiculo porque el que tiene en la foto ya es muy viejo.
texts.en:
Ruendy, 26 years old, is a visionary young man. In 2007, he graduated with a technical degree in logistics and customs. In 2010, he decided to study theology in a biblical institute, but didn't manage to finish his studies because the last two years he had to study in the country's capital and he didn't have a way to finance it. That was how he decided to dedicate himself to selling eggs, but while he was working selling eggs, he applied for a position in another company and he started working there and left the egg business to his stepfather. 

Currently Ruendy is married and his wife works in a gas station 3 kilometers from where they live. He is now working as an employee of an NGO that works in conjunction with the Ministry of Education of the country; specifically, he is working in a literacy program where his job is to graduate a certain number of illiterate people each month. He has been working there for 2 years and he feels very satisfied.

The loan requested is to purchase furniture for his house, as he and his wife are currently living with his mother-in-law and they want to become independent. With lots of effort they have managed to remodel a room that Ruendy's other gave him.

Ruendy dreams about having children and someday taking them to the United States to travel and also buying another car because the one that appears in the photo is too old.

loans.use: to purchase furniture for his house.

loans.name: Johan Sebastian

texts.es:
Johan, a sus 24 años de edad, es padre de 1 hijo, al que ha sacado adelante con arduo esfuerzo y dedicación. 

Durante mucho tiempo ha trabajado como comerciante independiente en su propio negocio de venta de detergentes; allí trabaja todos los días durante 5 horas y ha logrado generar los ingresos para solventar las necesidades familiares.

Expresa que su interés con el crédito es invertir en la compra de surtido al por mayor de productos como detergentes, jabones, suavizantes de ropa, entre otros para abastecerse lo suficiente y poder satisfacer los gustos de su clientela con la variedad que ofrecerá; esto le ayudará a mejorar las ventas  y los ingresos que recibe, además le hará frente a su mayor desafío que es sostenerse frente a la competencia desleal que se presenta en el sector. 

Johan manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es comprar vivienda y pagar la educación de su hijo.
texts.en:
Johan is 24 years old and father of a son whom he has gotten ahead with arduous effort and dedication.

He has worked as an independent merchant for a long time, running his detergent business.  He works every day for five hours a day and has managed to generate the resources he needs so he can provide for his family.

He says that he wants to use the money from this loan to stock his store with products such as detergents, soaps, fabric softeners, and other things so he can satisfy his customer demand with greater variety.

loans.use: to stock his store

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.es:
Gustavo es un hombre de buenas ideas y de mente creativa, siempre está tratando de buscar actividades para aumentar sus ingresos familiares.
El monto un café internet desde hace varios años y vende alternativamente algunos elementos de papelería en el mismo negocio.

El tiene 68 años y tiene todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar los desafíos que la vida le tenga preparados.
El solicita un apoyo económico para comprar algunos comestibles para mejorar la atención y diversificar sus ingresos. 

Con este dinero podrá invertir en su negocio y atraerá más clientes impactando de esta manera sus utilidades de una manera positiva.

Su mayor sueño es tener una gran sala de internet con buenos ingresos y generar empleo.
texts.en:
Gustavo has good ideas, a creative mind, and is always trying to find activities with which to increase his family income.

He started an Internet café a few years ago and sells some paper goods as part of the same business.

He is 68 years old and ready to face any challenges that life throws at him.

He is asking for financial support to buy some food in order to improve and diversify his income

This loan will allow him to be able to invest in his business and attract more customers which will positively affect his profits.
His greatest dream is to have a large Internet hall with a good income and that creates jobs.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Meylin Esmeralda

texts.es: Meylin de 33 años de edad que viven en casa de un familiar  junto a sus 2 hijos de 10 y 6 años de edad y que con mucho trabajo y dedicación ha logrado sacarlos adelante. Ella presta sus servicios domésticos desde hace un año y se ha ganado el respeto de sus vecinos y amigos, por lo que sus servicios son muy solicitados lo que le permite aportar a la economía de su hogar. Meylin lleva cierto tiempo construyendo su vivienda, la cual ha iniciado con sus ahorros, pero esto no le alcanzo para terminarla, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo, tablas y hierro para terminar de construir su vivienda lo antes posible y de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Meylin is 33 years old and lives at a relative’s house with her two children, ages 10 and 6 who she has gotten ahead through hard work and dedication.  She provides domestic service and has done so for a year.  Her services are well requested, which allows her to support her household.  Meylin has been building her house for some time, which she started with her own capital, but she doesn’t have enough to complete it, so she is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, sand, gravel, bricks, lumber, and iron bars so she can complete her house as soon as possible and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to finish building her house.

loans.name: Pheary

texts.en:
Pheary, 42 years of age, lives in a community in Pursat Province, Cambodia. A lovely mother of two children, to make a living and support her family she manages and operates a farming business on a small rice farmland which is located near her house. On average, she is able to make an income of USD 2.00 a day. 

Pheary wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use. Therefore, she is requesting a loan from KIVA to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and lessen environmental deterioration. 

Pheary is thankful for this loan opportunity granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Domerica Esmeralda

texts.es: Domerica de 32 años de edad quien vive en casa propia desde hace 32 años junto a sus 3 hijos de 15, 13 y 11 años de edad a los que ha logrado sacar adelante con mucho esfuerzo por lo que se siente muy orgullosa. Domerica presta sus servicios domésticos desde hace 11 años, pero además cuenta con el apoyo de su compañero de vida que le aporta a los gastos del hogar desde el extranjero. Domerica desea cambiar el piso de su vivienda ya que con el pasar de los años se ha deteriorado por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: cemento, ladrillo de piso, arena y  mano de obra para la instalar ladrillo de piso en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Domerica is 32 years old and has been living in a home of her own along with her 3 children, ages 15, 13, and 11, whom she has managed to get ahead with great effort and pride.  Domerica has been providing domestic service for 11 years, but also gets some support from her husband who sends money from overseas to cover the household expenses.

Domerica wants to replace the floor in her home because the current one has deteriorated over the years.  She is asking for a loan through FUSAI to buy cement, tiles, sand, and pay for labor.

loans.use: to replace a floor.

loans.name: Phearun

texts.en:
Phearun, 43, lives in a community in Pursat Province, Cambodia. She is a lovely mother of one child. Phearun is a teacher who earns, on average, an income of US $5 a day. She wants to improve the general living conditions of the entire family by having a latrine to use, because there is no latrine in her house now.

Phearun is borrowing a loan from KIVA to build a latrine. By doing this, she can help her family members gain access to sanitation, promote their health, and help to lessen environmental deterioration. She is thankful for the loan granted through HKL with a much lower interest rate than other general loan products.

loans.use: to build a latrine

loans.name: Maria Liza

texts.en:
Maria Liza is a married mother of 7 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 46 years old, and 3 of her children are in school.

Maria Liza has a candle making business in the Philippines. She has requested a 15,000 PHP loan amount through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy additional materials for her business such as wax. 

Maria Liza has successfully repaid her previous loan for her weaving business and is now requesting a new loan to build her new business.

Maria Liza has been in this business for 1 year. In the future, she would like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional raw materials for her candle making business.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with 5 children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 49 years old, and one of her children is currently in school.

Evelyn has a pig raising business in the Philippines. She has requested a 10,000 PHP loan amount through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

Evelyn has been in this business for 3 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and other supplies to raise her pigs.

loans.name: Helga Margarita

texts.es:
Helga con su gran voluntad y verdaderos deseos de salir adelante junto con su familia compuesta por su esposo y su hija, decidió emprender con un negocio de venta de mercancía como ropa y accesorios para vestir.  Estos elementos intenta venderlos para obtener la manutención de su familia.

Es una mujer emprendedora, con visión, juiciosa, organizada y muy simpática; valores que la han convertido en una vendedora muy reconocida.

Su anhelo es poder aumentar y hacer crecer su negocio, es por eso que solicita el apoyo de un crédito para invertirlo en la compra de ropa al por mayor, zapatos y accesorios.

Solo de este modo podrá tener esa gran oportunidad de progresar.
texts.en:
Helga started her own business so she could get ahead with her husband and daughter.  She sells products such as clothing and accessories.  She sells these items to support her family.

She is a friendly, organized, and very friendly, enterprising woman with a vision.  Her values have turned her into a very well-known saleswoman.

Her desire is to be able to grown her business so she is asking for a loan to buy clothing, shoes, and accessories in quantity.

This is the only way she can progress.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Manuela Maria

texts.es:
Ana se dedica a la venta de productos por catalogo, productos que son muy bien acogidos por los habitantes del municipio de Itagüí.

Es soltera y con gran satisfacción y amor por su trabajo, pues este le ha dado lo necesario para vivir.

Solicita un aliento económico el cual invertirá en la compra de mercancía como ropa, accesorios y demás para vender a través de catalogo.
 Con este préstamo podrá sacar adelante su empresa y podría convertirse en una gran empresaria a futuro.
texts.en:
Ana sells catalog products and these are well received by the Itagüí town residents.

She is single and very satisfied with her work because it has allowed her to make a living.  She is asking for financial support to buy merchandise such as clothing, accessories, and other items to sell via catalog.

This loan will help her advance her business so that it can become a great company in the future.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Juan Manuel

texts.es:
A sus 24 años, el señor Juan luego de ver lo difícil que era conseguir empleo, inicio a trabajar prestando servicios informáticos en el municipio del Chinu, desde entonces intenta prestar el mejor servicio posible a sus clientes.

 Cuenta con muy poco capital y es por eso que solicita un aliento económico para comprar una impresora multifuncional la cual utilizara para la impresión de trabajos y fotocopias.

Con este apoyo podrá intentar sacar su negocio adelante.
texts.en:
At age 24, Juan started his own information technology services business in Chinu, after finding it difficult to find work.  Since then, he works to provide his customers with the best service possible.

He has some capital so he is asking for financial assistance to buy a multifunction printer that he will use for print jobs and photocopies.

He will be able to get his business ahead with the help of this financial support.

loans.use: to buy a printer.

loans.name: Len
